The loan he is taking will be dedicated to cover some costs of his purchasing a new apartment.

loans.use: To cover some costs of purchasing a new apartment.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.es:
Elisabeth nació en la ciudad de Coya (Calca, Perú) y tiene 28 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija (Luz Diana de 11 años de edad). Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la venta de artesanía. Ella vende collares, mantas, mochilas, pulseras, agua mineral y otras cosas más. Su esposo Arístides se encarga de la elaboración de artesanía. Ya son 8 años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que ponen en su trabajo. Elisabeth requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo mantas, collares, sombreros, ponchos, guantes y otras cosas más. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Elisabeth was born in the city of Coya (Calca, Peru) and is 28 years old.  She is in a common-law relationship from which she has one daughter (Luz Diana, 11 years old).  Currently she lives in the city of Pisaq where she works.

She works selling handicrafts and has a sales stall in the arts and crafts market in the city of Pisaq.  She sells necklaces, blankets, backpacks, bracelets, mineral water, and other things.  Her husband Arístides takes care of making the handicrafts.  They have had this business for eight years already and it is going very well for them thanks to the effort they put into their work.

Elisabeth needs the loan to buy merchandise such as, for example, blankets, necklaces, hats, ponchos, gloves, and other things.

The members of Mosoq Ñusta Communal Bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world is there, Machu Picchu.

loans.use:
to buy merchandise such as blankets, 
necklaces, hats, ponchos, gloves, and other things.

loans.name: Yrene

texts.es:
Irene nació en la comunidad de Amaru de la ciudad de Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 36 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía de tipo cerámica, ella compra artesanía de tipo cerámica sin pintar pues su labor de la socia es darle color y brillo. Ella también vende sus productos en la ciudad de Pisaq y pertenece a una asociación de artesanos. Ya son 5 años que se dedica a la artesanía y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Irene requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como pintura, laca, barniz, arcilla y otras cosas más.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Irene was born in the community of Amaru in the city of Pisaq (Peru) and is 36 years old.  She has a common-law relationship from which she has five children.  Currently she lives in the city of Pisaq where she works.

She works making ceramic handicrafts.  She buys unpainted ceramic handicrafts and her job is to give them color and shine.  She also sells her products in the arts and crafts market in the city of Pisaq, and she belongs to the artisans' association.  She has been working in handicrafts for five years now and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

Irene needs the loan to buy materials such as paint, lacquer, varnish, clay, and other things.

The members of Mosoq Ñusta Communal Bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world is there, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy materials such as paint, lacquer, varnish, clay, and other things.

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr: Monsieur  Ibrahima est  un des vigiles  des guichets de l’IMF. Il est  mariée et père de famille. Il a recouru  aux préteurs pour  faire  fasse aux frais de scolarité de son fils ainé qui est en deuxième année de formation professionnel en mécanique. Il faut dire que c’est un investissement pour lui de bien suivre l’éducation de ses enfants  pour que dans l’avenir  ils puissent  le relever  par rapport aux dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Mr. Ibrahima is one of the night watchmen of the branch offices of this microfinance institution. He is married and a father. He has turned toward lenders to cope with the schooling costs for his eldest son, who is in his second year of professional training to be a mechanic. It must be said that this is an investment for him to pursue his children's education, so that they may help him in turn when it comes to day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to cover the cost of schooling for his son training to be a mechanic

loans.name: Ermek

texts.ru: Эрмек 46 лет, замужем, воспитывает четверых детей. Закончив факультет филологии, Эрмек начала работать в школе села Восьмое марта, где и работает по сей день преподавателем кыргызского языка. В 1990 году, в поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, Эрмек начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с покупки коров хозяйство сегодня приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Эрмек обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и кормов. Доходы от кредита Эрмек планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Ermek is 46 years old, married and raising four children. After graduating with a philology major, Ermek started to work at a school in the 8-March village, where she works to this day as a Kyrgyz-language teacher. In 1990, in search of an additional source of financing for her family, she became involved in animal husbandry. The business, started with a purchase of cows, currently yields about 15,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk products.  In order to further increase livestock headcount, Ermek requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sheep and livestock feed. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into increasing livestock headcount, which would allow her to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and feed

loans.name: Dolores Maria

texts.es: Dolores es un mujer de 44 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su taller de costura su historia empezó hace 10 años cuando dejo su actividad, su trabajo lo hace sola, si tiene dificultades, está soltera, si tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es prosperar en su taller de costura. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su taller de costura para comprar maquina de costura, telas, herramientas.
texts.en: Dolores is a 44 year-old woman who hopes to see her sewing workshop prosper in the coming years.  Her story began 10 years ago when she left her former work.  In her business she works alone.  She faces some difficulties, as she is single and has 2 children.  Her main dream is to see her sewing workshop prosper.  For this reason, she wants a loan for her sewing workshop, so that she can buy a sewing machine, fabric and other tools.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric and other dressmaking tools

loans.name: Seang

texts.en:
Seang is a 46-year-old, married woman residing with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia.

For over four years, she has been involved in the agriculture business. Specifically, she grows potatoes and earns approximately $5 per day. Her husband is employed at a rubber plantation and earns approximately $3 per day. One of her children is a tailor earning approximately $3 per day.

Seang would like to rebuild her current house. With this goal in mind, Seang is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to enlarge and strengthen her house and to thereby provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop at home and to help her children receive bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to enlarge and strengthen her house

loans.name: Chan Khan

texts.en:
Chan Khan is a 26-year-old, married woman residing with her husband and two children in Battambang Province, Cambodia.

For over two years, she has been selling vegetables and groceries, which allows her to earn approximately $15 per day. Her husband is a construction foreman earning approximately $10 per day.

Due to the difficulties her family experiences in getting around, Chan Khan is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use money saved on transportation expenses to better support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business, rebuild her house, and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Nemelyn

texts.en: Nemelyn is applying for a new loan of Php 13,000 to stock her variety store. The loan that she previously took from NWTF and KIVA continues to provide her and her family the opportunity to increase their income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en: Analyn is borrowing Php 20,000 to fund her hog business. The loan that she previously took for this business through KIVA and NWTF continues to provide Analyn and her family income to expand her agricultural business operations.

loans.use: to buy more piglets and feed.

loans.name: Lorelie

texts.en:
Lorelie is 35 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a soft drink distribution business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock.

Lorelie has borrowed and repaid nine previous loans from NWTF. She has been running her business for six years and earns additional income from a housing rental.

Lorelie aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Emma is 42 years old and has two children who are in school.

Emma buys and sells vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

Emma has been in this business for three years. In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to send her two children in college.

loans.use: To purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 49 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Susan runs a sari sari store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.

Susan has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, milk, creamer, noodles, and canned goods.

In the future, Susan would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Agrepina

texts.es:
Agrepina nació en la comunidad de Amaru del distrito Pisaq (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 43 años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene siete hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a  la venta de comida de forma ambulatoria en una plaza. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Agrepina requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, carne, fideos y otras cosas más.  

los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Agrepina was born in the Amaru community in the district of Pisaq (Cusco, Peru). She is 43 years old. She is in a common-law marriage, from which she has seven children. Currently, she lives in the city of Pisaq, where she does her work. She sells food as a street vendor in the main square. She has done this for many years already, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job. 

Agrepina needs the loan to buy more supplies such as rice, sugar, meat, beans, and other items.

The members of the "Mosoq Ñusta" communal bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very commercial and tourist area, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world, Machupicchu, is there.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies such as rice, sugar, meat, beans, and other items

loans.name: Aparicio Santiago

texts.es: El socio  el Sr. Aparicio Santiago; continua teniendo su estudio jurídico, y ahora el desea terminar de pagar los ultimos años de estudio de sus hijos en las carreras de economia y de derecho. El socio solicita el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en: Our member, Sr. Aparicio Santiago, is an attorney and has his own law practice.  He is applying for a loan to pay college expenses for his two children, one of whom is studying economics and the other law.

loans.use: to pay his children's college expenses.

loans.name: Lucia Santuza

texts.es:
Lucia es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en la ciudad de nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y sobre todo por sus gente muy generosa y acogedora, es madre de 4 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 20,16,15 y 10 años, a los cuales ama muchísimo y son su razón para vivir y salir adelante cada día, como buena peruana le gusta mucho nuestra comida, por ello uno de los platos favoritos de lucia es el riquísimo Trigo con Bisteck, debido a que sus padre no tenían los medios económicos suficientes ella solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro lucia pudo iniciar su negocio de venta de zapatos y accesorios, se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas diarias, ella es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo respetuosa y honrada por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio ya que los clientes siempre regresan a comprarle sus productos.

Lucia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería en especial zapatos de temporada escolar para su negocio y con ello podrá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer y tendrá mayores ingresos, así podrá seguir trabajando y luchando para cumplir su mas grande sueño:” Tener una tienda mas grande”
texts.en:
Lucia is a very hardworking woman.  She lives in the city of Nazca, which is known for its hot climate and above all for its extremely generous and welcoming people.  She is the mother of four children, who are 20, 16, 15, and 10 years old and whom she loves very much.  They are her reason for living and getting ahead every day.  Like all good Peruvians, she loves Peruvian cuisine, and one of Lucia's favorite dishes is the delicious trigo con bistec.  She only studied up until the fifth grade because her parents didn't have enough money, but she would have liked to have studied management.

After much effort and saving, Lucia was able to start her business selling shoes and accessories.  She spends about 10 hours a day at her business.  She is very friendly to her customers and above all she is respectful and honest, which is why she thinks her business is going well.  Her customers always come back to buy from her.

Lucia is very thankful to Kiva's lenders, as it is because of their help that she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business.  With that, she will be able to have a wider variety of products to offer and she will earn more, which will allow her to keep working and striving to achieve her greatest dream: to have a bigger store.

loans.use: to purchase school shoes

loans.name: Estefany

texts.es:
Estefany es una joven de 22 años, vive junto a su esposo y juntos tienen un hijo de al cual ama muchísimo y es su razón de vivir, ella vive en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, su agricultura y en especial por la generosidad de sus pobladores. 

Estefany trabaja en el campo y su esposo en obras de construcción y así como también conduciendo una mototaxi, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el dia, siempre tiene una buena actitud con los demas por eso ella cree que le va bien a su esposo en su negocio porque es muy trabajador y respetuoso y porque su hijo es el motor que ellos tienen para salir adelante.

Estefany está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo brindado ella podrá comprar una mototaxi para que su esposo pueda seguir trabajando, con esta mejora ya no tendrán que pagar alquiler y asi podrán tener mayores ingresos y seguir trabajando para poder cumplir su mas grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Estefany is a 22-year-old youth. She lives with her husband, and together they have a son whom she loves a lot, and he is her reason for living. She lives in the city of Imperial, a city characterized by its warm climate, agriculture and especially by the generosity of its inhabitants.
Estefany works in the field and her husband in construction and also driving a rickshaw. He works about 10 hours a day and can serve up to 15 customers a day. He always has a good attitude with others, which is why she believes that things are going well for her husband in his business - because he is a hard worker and very respectful, and also because their kids are the motor that they have to get ahead. 
Estefany is very grateful to Kiva lenders since, thanks to the support they are providing, she will be able to buy a rickshaw so that her husband can continue working. With this improvement, they will no longer have to pay rent and in this way will have greater income and will continue working to achieve their biggest dream: “to have their own home and to give their son a profession.”

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw.

loans.name: Aristides

texts.es:
El socio   Aristides sigue pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” y continua viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco y donde también realiza sus actividades económicas. 

El socio Aristides sigue dedicándose a la producción y venta de artesanía. Con el anterior préstamo Aristides pudo incrementar el capital del negocio y obtuvo buenos beneficios y pudo comprar mas mercadería. En esta oportunidad Aristides requiere el préstamo para comprar artesanía como por ejemplo ceramica y tambien va comprar materiales como por ejemplo pintura y esmaltes. 

La socia Aristides agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Aristides continues belonging to “IMASUMAC II” Communal Bank and continues living in the city of Cusco where he engages in his economic activities.

He continues making and selling handicrafts. With the previous loan Aristides was able to increase his working capital and he earned good profits by buying more merchandise. At this time, Aristides needs the loan to buy crafts such as ceramics and he is also going to buy paint and enamels. 

He is grateful for the support being provided him and is committed to making his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as paint and enamels

loans.name: Dios Es Amor Group

texts.es:
La señora Lucia es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Dios e Amor”, este grupo está conformado por 07 personas que se dedican a distintas actividades comerciales. Lucía tiene 54 años y tiene 09 hijos, 02 de los cuales aun son dependientes. Hace más de 20 años que la señora Lucía se dedica a la venta ambulatoria de frutas, confiterías y bebidas; siendo la mayor parte de sus clientes personas que viajan al centro del país. Ella se siente orgullosa, pues con su esfuerzo ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos. Ella se ha trazado como meta implementar una bodega; pues de esta manera incrementará sus ingresos económicos y su calidad de vida. En esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, agua mineral y diversa variedad de fruta que serán ofrecidas a sus clientes. La Alcancía “Dios es Amor” está agradecida con el crédito porque hace posible su progreso.
La señora Lucía es la que viste chompa negra y chaleco verde. En la parte inferior están las fotografías de las señoras Yrene y Leidi.
texts.en: Lucia is a member of the communal bank "God is Love" group that is made up of 7 responsible people who do different commercial activities for a living. Lucia is 54 years old and is separated with 9 children, 2 of which are still dependents. It was more than 20 years ago that Lucia began the ambulatory selling of fruit, candy and beverages, the majority of her clients being people that travel to the center of the country. She is proud of her strength to be able to progress her children alone, as she is a single mother. The money that she receives is of much help for her since it allows her to continue supporting her children. Lucia has a goal to install a grocery store since this assures her that she will have greater income. In this opportunity, she is requesting the loan to purchase soda, mineral water, and fruit to offer to her clients. The communal bank "God is Love" is grateful for the loan since it makes their progress possible. Lucia is the one that you see in the black sweater and green vest. At the bottom are Leidi and Yrene's photographs.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, mineral water and fruit.

loans.name: Lideres Del Tercer Milenio Group

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal LIDERES DEL TERCER MILENIO; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.
El socio Genaro tiene 40 años es casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de libros el socio viaja hasta la ciudad de Lima y Arequipa para comprar su mercadería para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que  el solicitan como por ejemplo : librerías, él socio a la vez cuenta con un carrito que lo  alquila brindando el servicio interprovincial todos los días, él socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

El socio solicita el prestamo para aumentar mas mercaderia para su negocio de libros.

Los otros socios se dedican a la compra y venta de fotocopiadoras, venta de libros, transporte turístico, venta de periódicos.

El socio agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
(los socios que aparecen en la parte superior de la fotografia son socios que pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo ).
texts.en:
The LIDERES DEL TERCER MILENIO Communal Bank is located in the Wanchaq district in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
Genaro is 40, married, and has three children. He alternates his daily chores with his business buying and selling books. He travels to the cities of Lima and Arequipa to buy merchandise to later sell to his customers, such as bookstores. He also has a little car with which he provides inter-provincial transportation every day. He is a very happy and responsible person, with a great desire to get ahead for the sake of his family.
He is requesting this loan to increase his stock of books to sell.
The other members buy and sell photocopiers, sell books, provide transportation for tourists, and sell newspapers.
Genaro is grateful to be able to get his loan this way and promises to repay his quotas. The members at the top of the photo are those who were unable to attend for work reasons.

loans.use: to increase his stock of merchandise for his book business.

loans.name: Tserenbat

texts.en:
Mr. Tserenbat, 30, is a taxi driver, and he has been running his business nonstop since 2008. 

Now, he lives with his parents in the Ger district, a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent district, which is in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Still, he runs a taxi with his old, used car. Lately it has been damaged and is becoming old completely, especially its core part, a gear box, which has an issue that must be resolved to work normally. It will have a faulty influence, as he said. Therefore, he decided to renovate his car to further run his business normally. He is requesting a loan to purchase the spare parts for his old car.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his old car.

loans.name: Sarin

texts.en:
Sarin is a 45-year-old, married man residing with his wife and three children in Battambang Province, Cambodia.

For over ten years, he and his wife have been involved in the agriculture business. They have extensive experience in this industry sector, and they have been successful thus far in their careers. Specifically, they grow rice and raise cattle. On average, they earn approximately $8 per day. Sarin also works as a construction worker, allowing him to earn approximately $4 per day of additional income to better support the family.

In order to expand his family’s business operations, Sarin is requesting a loan in the amount of $800 to rent four hectares of farmland for rice growing. By doing so, he would be able to generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his agriculture business by purchasing two hectares of farmland for growing even more rice and to help his children get their bachelor degrees. Moreover, he plans to enlarge and strengthen their house to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to rent four hectares of farmland for rice growing purposes

loans.name: Crema

texts.en: Crema is now seeking her 19th loan. Specifically, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 28,000 PHP, which she intends to use to purchase additional goods to sell in her variety store. The shell crafting business that she previously funded through NWTF and KIVA loans continues to provide Crema and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en:
Mr. Davaasuren is a 51-year-old man living with him family in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.

He is an accountant, but for the past three years he has operated a taxi to earn a living. Lately, his taxi has been operating poorly because its core parts are damaged. Therefore, he has decided to fully repair his car, which he believes will allow him to generate an increase in profits in the future. The loan proceeds he is seeking will be dedicated to purchasing spare parts for his car.

loans.use: To repair his taxi by purchasing additional spare parts.

loans.name: Komiljon

texts.ru: Комилчон проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 32 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его дети маленькие. Комилчон занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает картошку и сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян пшеницы.
texts.en: Komiljon lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 32 years old, married and has three children.  All of his children are small.  Komiljon is involved in agriculture.  He primarily grows potatoes and sows wheat.  He has been in this business for 15 years.  Komiljon is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers and wheat seeds.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and wheat seeds

loans.name: Abdurasul

texts.ru: Абдурасул житель района Джиликул. Он занимается растениеводством. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он берет кредит для посева пшеницы, риса и хлопка.
texts.en: Abdurasul is a resident of the Jilikul district.  He is involved in agriculture.  He is 37 years old, married and has five children.  Abdurasul is requesting this loan to sow wheat, rice and cotton.

loans.use: to sow wheat, rice and cotton

loans.name: Sukhbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Sukhbaatar, 59, runs a taxi around the districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been doing his business since 2008 and already has had many permanent customers. He lives with his family in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent, in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar. Currently his taxi business income is the main income source for his family. His oldest son has decided to start a business like his father’s. First he needs to purchase a suitable car. The loan Sukhbaatar is taking will be dedicated to cover the cost of his son’s purchasing a car for starting a taxi business.

loans.use: To purchase a car for his son to start a taxi business.

loans.name: Efrin

texts.en:
Efrin is married with 3 children. He is 52 years old and lives in Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.

Efrin is operating a general store, selling a variety of products to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for 7 years and every month he earns 3,000 from this work. He has requested a loan of 5,000 to purchase additional products to sell.

In 2008, Efrin joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. Efrin hopes to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Cesar Agusto Group

texts.es:
El grupo Cesar Agusto lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Azucena quien se dedica a la venta de especies como canela, ayote, comino, salsa inglesa, pimienta…etc. Este trabajo lo realiza de manera ambulante en Managua. Ella es casada con José con el cual tiene 3 hijos por los cuales trabajan arduamente.
Las otras integrantes son Silvia quien desde hace 20 años tiene una tortillería y Harol quien vende frutas.
texts.en:
The César Agusto group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising people.  One of them is Azucena, who works selling spices such as cinnamon, annatto, cumin, Worcestershire sauce, pepper, etc.  She does this work as a street vendor in Managua.  She is married to José, with whom she has three children for whom she works hard.

The other members are Silvia, who has had a tortilla business for 20 years, and Harol, who sells fruit.

loans.use: to buy spices.

loans.name: Shahab Group

texts.en:
This group is called SHAHAB. It is made up of three women: Amnh, Ahlam and Gmalh who are neighbors from Aden, Yemen. They are hard-working women. They took a loan of 140,000 YER.

Amnh is the leader of this group. In the photo, she is the woman who wears a green scarf and has her face uncovered. She is a 57-year-old, married woman and the mother of 10 young children who live in Aden, Yemen. 

She has been operating a small general store for seven years. Due to her professional experience in this field, she attracted more clients, which helped her business to continue running successfully and made the business more profitable.

In the pursuit of satisfying her clients,  she has just obtained her second a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB. This new loan is meant to allow her to supply her business with Sault, soaps, eggs, water packets, etc to enable her to better respond to the demands of her clients and higher profits.  In the future, she hopes to see her children grow up comfortably and to enlarge her business.

loans.use: to purchase Sault, soaps, eggs, water packets, etc to sell

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is from Camanga, Tukuran Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 32 years old, married, and owns and operates a specialized retail store. Conchita has been in her business for 8 years and earns 4,000 a month from it. 

In 2010, Conchita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to do business. Conchita is requesting a new loan of 7,300 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 36 years old, married and has 3 children. To make a living, Juditha owns and operates a business venture providing transportation services to local community members. Juditha has been engaged in her business for 6 years and earns 6,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2008, Juditha joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Juditha is requesting a new loan of 11,700 PHP which will be used to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Manuchehr

texts.ru: Манучехр холост. Ему 24 года. Он имеет высшее образование. По профессии он преподавателей. В этой области он два года. Кроме того Манучехр занимается скотоводством. Он берет кредит для закупа теленка.
texts.en: Manuchehr is single. He is 24 years old and has a college degree as an educator. He has been working as a teacher for two years. Manuchehr supplements his salary by raising cattle for meat sales and is taking out this loan to purchase a calf.

loans.use: to purchase a calf

loans.name: Kenzhebubu

texts.ru: Кенжебубу вдова, воспитывает троих детей. Кенжебубу работает медсестрой  в детском саду. В  2010 году, в поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, Кенжебубу начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с покупки скота на сумму 20,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство сегодня насчитывает одну корову, одну лошадь и пятнадцать овец. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Кенжебубу обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы от кредита Кенжебубу планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Kenshebubu is a widow and is raising three children. She works as a nurse in the local kindergarten. In 2010 Kanzhebubu started to raise livestock for profit to supplement her family's finances. She used 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase a cow, a horse and fifteen sheep. In order to buy more sheep for her herd, Kenzhebubu has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use the profits from this venture to further expand her herd and develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mejor Futuro Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mejor Futuro lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Liliam del Socorro quien se dedica al comercio de verduras por el mercado de Managua e invertirá el crédito en la compra de mercadería. Ella está casada con Juan Bautista quien trabaja en la tip-top  y con quien tiene dos hijos
Las otras integrantes son  Solanlly quien se dedica al comercio de verduras desde hace 4 años y  Miguel  quien se dedica al comercio de leña desde hace 20 años.
texts.en:
The “Mejor Futuro” (Better Future) group is comprised of three hard-working and enterprising people.  Liliam del Socorro is one of them.  She sells vegetables at the Managua market.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise.  She is married to Juan Bautista, who works at the Tip-Top, and they have two children.

Solanlly is also a member, and she has been selling vegetables for four years.  Miguel, the third member, has been selling firewood for 20 years.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Tegal Badeng Indah Group

texts.en: To increase the population of her pigs, Ni Ketut used her loan to purchase four superior piglets. Using her profit from the last loan, she also purchased two local pigs. Now she has four superior piglets and two local pigs for fattening. The business really helps her family income. With the profit, she can save for future needs. She hopes this period she will be more successful, earn more profit and make her family more prosperous.

loans.use: To purchase four superior piglets

loans.name: Sapargeldi

texts.ru: Сапаргелды проживает в районе Джиликул. Он женат. Ему 32 года. У него трое детей. Он занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он 16 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян.
texts.en: Sapargeldi lives in Jilikul region. He is 32 years old, married and has three children. Sapargeldi is a farmer and has been growing crops for 16 years. He is taking out this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the spring planting season.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Beyshenbubu

texts.ru: Бейшенбубу вдова, воспитала четверых детей. Бейшенбубу занимается разведением скота, ставшим основным источником финансирования для ее семьи. Начатое с покупки скота на сумму 2,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство сегодня насчитывает одну корову,  пятнадцать овец и приносит около 5,000 сом в месяц. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Бейшенбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от кредита Бейшенбубу планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Beyshenbubu is a widow who has raised four children. She now raises livestock for a living and this business is the primary source of income for her family. She started her herd with 2,000 som (KGS) and currently owns a dairy cow and fifteen sheep, resulting in 5,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to buy more animals, Beyshenbubu has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS). She is planning to invest the profits in additional animal purchases and so expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kumush

texts.ru:
Кумуш 40 лет, замужем, имеет 6 детей, все школьники. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Кумуш занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Начатое еще в период Советского Союза с 2,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Кумуш  имеется три коровы, одна лошадь, один теленок и десять овец. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кумуш обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров и минеральных удобрений. Доходы Кумуш планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, а будущем – накопить деньги на образование для своих детей.
texts.en:
Kumush is 40 years old, she is married and has six children who are going to school. As a source of income for her family Kumush does animal husbandry and agriculture. She started the business during the Soviet times with 2,000 som (KGS) and today it brings around 6,000 som a month. At this time Kumush's business has three cows, one horse, one calf and ten sheep.

To further develop her business Kumush has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy milk cows and mineral fertilizer. She plans to invest the income from the loan into increasing the headcount of cattle and in the future to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Marème

texts.fr:
Madame Marième est une femme veuve âgée de 67 ans et elle mère d'un enfant et de deux petits fils à sa charge.
Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 02/12/2008. 

Elle fait du commerce de détails dans la vente de mil d'arachides et des fruits saisonniers. Elle dispose d'une expérience de plusieurs années dans ce secteur.

Avec son nouveau crédit de 300000 francs CFA elle va acheter de la marchandise pré cité.

Mariéme nous informe qu'avec ses bénéfices elle achète de la nourriture pour sa famille et des médicaments en cas de maladie.
texts.en:
Marème is a widow and 67 years old. She is the mother of one and has two grandchildren to support.

She has been a member of the banc villageois since 2 February 2008.

She sells millet, groundnuts and seasonal fruit to individuals, and has several years' experience in this sector.

Marème will use her new loan of 300 000 francs CFA to buy the above products.

With the profits from her business she will buy food for her family and medication in case of illness.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, millet and oranges to resell

loans.name: Sobeya De Tessito Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Sobéya de Tessito  est créé lors de l’inauguration du banc villageois. Il est composé de 15 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame  Aissatou,  (debout en deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche), est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants, elle a en charge 02 élèves venus des villageois environnants. 

C’est une vendeuse de banane, qu’elle achète à bord des périmètres de sa localité pour ensuite les écouler vers un pays de la sous région. Activité qu’elle pratique depuis plus de 07 ans. 

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter des régimes de bananes pour les revendre.

Les revenus de l’activité lui permettent d’aider son mari sur la prise en charge des frais scolaires des enfants. De même épargner pour acheter un terrain dans le  futur.
texts.en:
The Sobéya de Tessito group was created at the inception of the banc villageois.  It is made up of 15 women who live in the same district.  They all run small businesses. 

Mrs. Aissatou (standing second from the right) is the leader of the group.   She is 43 years old.  She is married and the mother of 5 children.  She has two students in her care who come from neighboring villages. 

She buys bananas on the outskirts of town and then takes them to sell in southern regions.   She has been doing this work for seven years. 

With this loan, she plans to buy bunches of bananas to sell.

loans.use: to buy bunches of bananas to sell in Gambia.

loans.name: Sop S. Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le GS Sop Sérigne Fallo est crée le 28 Décembre 2010. Il est composé de 17 femmes qui habitent toutes le même quartier et exerçant la même activité. 

Fatou (Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main) est responsable du groupe de solidarité. Elle est agée de 55 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. 

Elle développe une activité commerciale de semences d'arachide, de "niébé" et d'oseille. Elle fait également la transformation et vente d'huile d'arachide
 
Avec le prêt reçu, elle compte acheter de l'arachide en graine, niébé et "bissap" (oseille) pour revendre. 

Avec les recettes générées elle compte améliorer les conditions de vie de sa prgéniture.
texts.en:
The Solidarity Group Sop Sérigne Fallo was established on December 28, 2010.  It is made up of 17 women who live in the same neighborhood and are involved in the same business.

Fatou (standing to the right of the photo, raising her hand) is in change of the group.  She is 55 years old.  She is married and has two children.

She has created a commercial business selling groundnuts, black-eyes peas, and bissap, (a drink made from hibiscus flowers).  She also makes and sells groundnut oil.

With this loan, she intends to purchase groundnuts, black-eyed peas, and bissap for resale.

With the profits earned, she intends to improve her living conditions and those of her children.

loans.use: to purchase groundnuts for their groundnut oil business.

loans.name: Adja Ndeye Anta Dieng Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité a été créé le 09 juillet 2011, il est constitué de quatre femmes qui habitent le même quartier et font la même activité, le petit commerce. 


Salimata âgée de 57 ans a en charge 10 enfants. Elle gère un poulailler depuis 03 ans. Elle est assisse à droite sur la photo avec une écharpe noire autour des épaules.


C'est au marché central qu'elle achète sa marchandise et ses poussins et revend à domicile.

Son prêt lui permettra de renforcer ses activités.




Elle assure la prise en charge de sa famille.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on July 9, 2011.  It consists of four women who live in the same neighborhood and are involved in small retail business.

Salimata is 57 years old and has 10 children in her care.  She has been managing a henhouse for 3 years.  She is sitting on the far right in the photo, with a black scarf around her shoulders.  She buys her chicks and merchandise at the central market and sells from home.  Her loan will allow her to boost her activity.  Salimata provides for her family.

loans.use: to buy chicks and other merchandise.

loans.name: Cielo Azul Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CIELO AZUL” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Juan Pablo II, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Gladys. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de dulces, venta de ropa interior, tienda de consumo, venta de abarrotes, librería, venta de joyas, venta de café.

La señora Gladys,  indica que hace dos años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una socia. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de joyas que viene trabajando hace algún tiempo.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de joyas) que adquirirá de las ferias y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el trabajo de grupo y compartir con sus compañeras.
texts.en:
El grupo "Cielo azul" will begin their second cycle of loans with Pro Mujer (part of the focal center of Juan Pablo II).  The group is comprised of 8 members and is directed by a board of directors led by Mrs. Gladys.  The businesses that the group members of the communal bank run are varied.  Among them we have the following: Selling sweets, selling intimate apparel, selling food, selling groceries, selling books, selling jewels, and selling coffee.  

Mrs. Gladys notes that she has been working with Pro Mujer for two years and that she joined the group because of the invitation of a group member.  Currently she has a business selling jewels and she has been working in this area for some time.  

The credit that she will get is in order to increase her capital (for buying jewelry).  She will acquire the jewelry at fairs and later sell it at her stand.  This form of work allows her to generate income to support her family, since she is single and has two children.  

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the work of the group and to share with her fellow group members.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: La señora Rosa , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su familia , los planes futuros es poder mejorar las condicones economicas , ya que por varios años se a dedicado al negocio de abarrotes , comidas rapidas , refrescos naturales , entre otros producctos , lo cual le a servido para el sustento de cada dia , agradece el apoyo que le brinda afodenic atraves de kiva ; ya que con los financiminentos a mejorado su negocio en cuanto a inventario , ahora hace desayunos , almuerzo , sopas . Ella necesita el prestamo para mejorar la infraestrucctura del kiosko ya que en tiempos de lluvia  todo el agua ingresa y en el verano el polvo no la deja trabajr bien por los fuertes vientos ya que esta en una calle centrica del municipio que es muy transitada .
texts.en:
Rosa lives in the town of Ticuantepe together with her family.  Her plans for the future are to improve her financial situation.  For several years she has had a business selling groceries, fast food, and natural soft drinks, among other products.  This has provided for daily sustenance.

She is grateful for the support provided by Afondenic through Kiva.  The loans have improved her business inventory.  She now makes breakfast, lunch, and soups.

She needs the loan to improve the infrastructure of her kiosk.  During the rainy times all of the water gets in.  During the summer the dust keeps her from working well because of the strong winds.  She is on a central street in a municipality that is well-traveled.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of her kiosk.

loans.name: Emalinda

texts.en:
Emalinda works hard to support her family. Emalinda is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Emalinda requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of fish to sell.

Emalinda has been in this business for 24 years now.

In the future, Emalinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Jamilya

texts.ru: Чамиля проживает в городе Душанбе. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж таксист. Сама Чамиля открыла ателье, где занимается шитьем платьев. В этой области она 7 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения нескольких швейных машин оборудованных компьютерным устройством.
texts.en: Jamilya lives in Dushanbe. She is 28 years old, married and has three children. He husband works as a taxi driver. Jamilya herself has a sewing studio which specializes in making custom native Tajik dresses for sale. She has been working as a seamstress for seven years. Jamilya is requesting this loan to purchase a few computerized sewing machines for her business.

loans.use: to purchase computerized sewing machines

loans.name: Nazri

texts.ru: Назри проживает в районе Джиликул. Ей 63 года. Он замужем. У нее восемь детей. Трое ее сыновей находятся в Российской Федерации. Сама она занимается растениеводством. Кредит берет для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nazri lives in the Jilikul region. She is 63 years old, married and a mother of eight children. Three of her sons are away to find work in Russia. Nazri herself is a farmer and is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сураё жительница района Джиликул. Ей 37 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Ее муж в России. А дети студенты. Сама она занимается торговлей. У себя дома она открыла продуктовый ларек. Также Сураё занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. У нее при доме имеется небольшой участок земли, где она выращивает картошку и сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 21 год. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян.
texts.en: Surayo live in the Jilikul region. She is 37 years old, married and a mother of four children. He husband is away, working in Russia. Her children are college students. Surayo runs a small grocery store from her home. She also farms on a small plot of land by her house where she grows wheat and potatoes. Surayo has been making a living like this for 21 years and is taking this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Noungou

texts.fr: Madame Noungou est une femme de 54 ans qui vit dans une des collectivités locales du Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce et pratique la vente de tissus. Elle a choisi cette activité par nécessité dans le souci d’augmenter ses revenus personnels. Elle est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis 2009. Elle a déjà remboursé 3 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 prévu pour le règlement d’une nouvelle commande de tissus qui seront destinés a satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle.  Ce financement lui permettra d’augmenter ses  bénéfices, de soutenir son mari dans le prise en charge des besoins de leur famille pour ainsi en  améliorer le  niveau de vie.
texts.en:
Noungou is a 54-year-old woman who lives in one of the local communities of Senegal.  She is actively involved in retail and sells fabrics.  She chose this activity out of necessity, in order to increase her personal income.  She has been a member of one of the local UIMCEC branches since 2009 and has already repaid three previous loans.  

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 300,000 francs.  She will use this loan to pay for a new order of fabrics which should meet her customers' needs.  With this loan she will be able to increase her profits, help her husband provide for the family, and therefore improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for a new order of fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Isanboy

texts.ru: Исанбой проживает в районе Пяндж. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его дети учатся в средней школе. Сам он более тридцати лет занимается скотоводством. Исанбой берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Isanboy lives in the Pyandj region. He is 54 years old, married and has six children. His kids still attend school. He has been raising animals for more the thirty years and is taking out this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Romanita

texts.en:
Romanita is from Sto Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 57 years old. Romanita is a widow and has one child. 

To make a living, Romanita is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community. Romanita has been in her business for seven years and earns 5,800 PHP a month for these activities.

Romanita is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. In 2008, Romanita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Alili

texts.en:
Alili is a widow and has two children. Alili is from Upper Bayao, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 48 years old. 

To make a living, Alili is running/operating a general store. Alili has been in her business for three years and earns 2,500 PHP a month for these activities.

Alili is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. Earlier this year, Alili joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is married with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jocelyn is 48 years old. Four of her children are in school.

Jocelyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing equipment for her business.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money to send her four children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional fishing equipment for her business

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 46 years old and married with four children. With two of the children in school, Rosa works very hard to provide for them.

Rosa runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Rosa has been in this business for nine years.

In the future, Rosa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor es   una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, el se  preocupa  por   brindar  a su familia una excelente  estabilidad,  el acudió a  la institución ya que  desea   realizar  la  compra  de un portón para  su vivienda,  ya  que su mayor sueño es  proteger   su domicilio   de la inseguridad de  hoy  en día, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para la  realización  de  su  proyecto ya  que   nos  comenta  el  señor que  cuando  salga  de su  domicilio  a  trabajar lo hará  de  una manera  tranquila  al saber   de   que  su  hogar  se  encuentra  protegido.
texts.en: Victor is a very responsible and hardworking person who is concerned about providing his family with excellent stability.  He came to the institution because he wants to purchase a gate for his house, since his main dream is to protect his home from the insecurities of the current times.  He appreciates the support being provided to fund this project.  He comments to us that when he leaves his home to go to work, he will be able to do so in a peaceful manner because he will know that his home will be protected.

loans.use: to buy a gate

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Amador es un hombre  trabajador y emprendedor quien es entrenador y equitador de caballos desde  hace 10 años. El compara y entrena caballos los cuales vende después, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de caballos.
Él está casado con Eveling con quien tiene 4 hijos por los cuales trabajan arduamente para sacar adelante.
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos Amador is a hardworking and enterprising man who has trained and worked with horses for ten years. He buys and trains horses and then sells them. The loan will be used to buy horses.

Carlos is married to Evelina and they have four children. They work hard to help their family get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy horses

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en:
Rosana is 37 years old and married with three children who are in school. Rosana works very hard to provide for them.

Rosana runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell.

Rosana has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as spices, eggs, soft drinks, milk, snack foods, etc.. 

In the future, Rosana would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more stocks to sell

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a widowed woman living in Tukuran within Zamboanga del Sur province in the Philippines. She is 56 years old with two grown children.

Erlinda used her last loan to purchase farm fertilizers to hasten the growth of her crops. Her farming has been successful, and she's now taking a 7000 PHP loan from GDMPC to pay for the labor cost in preparing the land for replanting.

In the future she hopes to be able to develop her farm further.

loans.use: to pay for the labor cost in preparing the land for replanting.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma works hard to support her family. Emma is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Emma requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle.

Emma has been in this business for 19 years now.

In the future, Emma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for her motorcycle

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is 63 years old and married with 10 children.

Felicitas works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Felicitas has borrowed and paid back 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years. She earns additional income from selling frozen products.

Felicitas aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks to sell

loans.name: Ruth Del Carmen

texts.es: Ruth es una mujer de 30 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su servicio de ropa su historia empezó con la venta de yogurt con el esposo y se decidió a vender ropa, su trabajo lo hace con la ayuda de su esposo y sale a recorrer, si tiene dificultades son la delincuencia, si está casada su esposo es pescador, si tiene hijos estudia en escuela fiscal, su sueño más importante es seguir superándome en la familia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su servicio de ropa comprando asi pantalones, camisas, blusas.
texts.en:
Ruth is a 30-year old mother. She has great hopes that her clothing business will do well over the next few years. She and her husband started out selling yoghurt and then she decided to sell clothing. Her husband helps her with this business too. She travels around to sell the clothing and sometimes has problems with customers who don’t pay. 

Ruth’s husband is a fisherman. Their children attend school. Her dream is for her family to make progress, and so she needs a loan to buy pants, shirts, and blouses for her business.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, and blouses

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 58 years old, married and has nine children. For the past nine years she has sold charcoal and firewood in the Philippines. She also earns money from buying and selling young coconuts. Anita works hard to provide for her family.

Anita has borrowed and paid off eight loans from NWTF before this one. She is now requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Anita wants to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 53 years old and has eight children. Merlinda is married and three of her children are in school.

Merlinda is in the agricultural business raising pig in the Philippines. Merlinda requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed for her pigs.

Merlinda has been raising pig for five years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Merlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase feed for her pigs

loans.name: Reginald

texts.en:
Reginald is 26 years old and single.

Reginald works hard to provide for his family. He runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell.

Reginald has borrowed and paid back eight loans from NWTF before this loan. He has been running the general store for four years and earns additional income from charcoal, firewood and fruits retail.

Reginald aspires to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy more stocks to sell

loans.name: Churek

texts.ru:
Чурек вдова, воспитала четверых детей. Сейчас Чурек живет со снохой и внуком, так как сын в России на заработках.
Чурек родилась в простой семье чабана. После школы, Чурек поступила в Прежевальское кооперативное училище, на специальность  продавец. После окончания училища, Чурек уехала в Московский район к родственникам, устроилась дояркой в колхоз «Дружба» в с.Александровка и в 1981 году вышла замуж. Муж Чурек работал трактористом в этом же колхозе. Молодой семье руководство колхоза выделило дом, в котором и родились четверо детей Чурек. 20 лет семья Чурек жила в с.Александровка, за это время они с мужем обзавелись хозяйством, вырастили детей. Из- за распада колхоза, в котором работала Чурек и ее муж, им пришлось продать скот и переехать в село Ровное Панфиловского района, где они на вырученные деньги купили дом. Муж Чурек устроился механизатором в колхоз «Шапак», а Чурек в это время занималась домашним хозяйством и детьми. В 2003 году Чурек с мужем решили заняться животноводством и купили телочку. Начав со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS), они смогли развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме 7,000 сом. 
2010 году Чурек потеряла любимого мужа и стала единственным кормильцем семьи. Упорный труд и  настойчивость позволили Чурек продолжить начатое с мужем дело. На сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве насчитывается две коровы и 1 телка и в целях увеличения поголовья скота, Чурек обратилась в компанию «Бай Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от кредита Чурек планирует вкладывать в увеличение поголовья, а в будущем – накопить деньги на обучение внука.
texts.en:
Churek is a widow and has raised four children. Currently Churek lives with her daughter-in-law and her grandson, while her son is away to Russia to earn money. 

Churek was born into a simple family of a sheep herder. After school she attended Prjewalski co-op institute to earn her degree as a saleswoman. Upon finishing her studies Churek moved to the Moskovski region where she had relatives and started working as a milkmaid in the "Druzhba" farming co-op in the Aleksandrovka village. In 1981 she married a tractor driver from the same co-op. The young family received a house from the co-op's administration and Churek's four children were born there. They lived and worked for the co-op for 20 years, raised their children there, slowly purchased their own herd of livestock. After the farming co-op broke apart with the fall of the Soviet Union, they lost their jobs and were forced to sell their livestock and move to the Rovnoe village in Panfilovski region, where they were able to buy a house. Churek's husband started working as a mechanic in "Shapak" farming co-op and Churek took care of the house and children. 

In 2003 Churek and her husband decided to start raising livestock again and purchased a heifer. Their livestock business began with 5,000 som (KGS) and it grew to yield 7,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In 2010 Churek's husband passed away and she became her family's main provider. Her hard work and determination allowed Churek to continue her husband's business and currently her herd has two milk cows and a heifer. In order to purchase more animals she has turned to "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS). Churek is planning to use the profits from this loan to purchase more animals and in the future save enough money for her grandson's education.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru: Наби житель района Рудаки. Ему 26 лет. Он женат. Он занимается растениеводством. В этой области Наби четыре года. Кредит берет для оборудования парника и приобретения семян цветков, чтобы заняться цветоводством.
texts.en: Nabi is a resident of Rudaki region. He is 26 years old and married. Nabi has been farming for four years. He is taking out this loan to build a greenhouse and purchase flower seeds so that he can grow flowers for sale.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse and purchase flower seeds

loans.name: Pascuala Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Pascuala del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de bebidas típicas como pinolillo, semilla de jícaro y frutas desde hace 16 años. Ella inicio este negocio con el firme propósito de salir adelante junto con su familia quienes la apoyan.
 El crédito lo invertirá en maíz, leña, cacao, frutas…etc.
texts.en: Pascuala del Carmen is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has had a business selling traditional drinks such as pinolillo (a drink made of corn mean and cocoa), semilla de jicaro (a drink made with rice and ground jicaro seeds), and fruit juices, for 16 years.  She started this business with the goal of getting ahead with her family, who provides her with support.  She will invest this loan in corn, firewood, cocoa, fruit and other supplies

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, cocoa, fruit and other supplies

loans.name: Claudia Elizabeth

texts.es: Claudia  es  un apersona  muy responsable   , que  se preocupa  por   brindarle a  sus  hijos  lo mejor  en la  vida, es  por  ello  que  ella se acerco  con nosotros  ya  que  desea   realizar  la  construcción de  un baño  en su  vivienda ,  ya que con la  casa  que  cuenta  actualmente   la  adquirió  con esfuerzo, pero nos  comenta  que   por  el momento  esta  utilizando el  baño de la  casa  de  su mama  ya  que   vive   a  un lado de  su   domicilio,  ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de  hacer  de  su   sueño  una realidad  por  lo que  se  encuentra   muy  contenta  de  habernos  encontrado.
texts.en: Claudia is a very responsible person who's concerned about providing the very best for her children. That's why she approached us, since she wishes to build a bathroom in her house. She worked hard to purchase the house she currently owns, but she reports that, at the moment, she's using the bathroom at her mother's house next door. She sees the loan as a possibility to make her dream come true, which is why she's very glad to have found us.

loans.use: to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Erika Lissete

texts.es: Lissete es una mujer de 24 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de cosméticos su historia empezó hace 2 años por medio de una amiga escogió esta actividad en la cual se desempeña hasta hoy, su trabajo lo hace sola no tiene horario fijo, si tiene dificultades son la inseguridad y las enfermedades, no está casada tiene unión libre, si tiene 3 hijos estudian en escuela fiscal, su sueño más importante es tener a sus hijos con buena salud que el mayor termino la primaria y en cuenta al negocio que tenga un local de venta. Su credito lo quiere para comprar cosmeticos, perfumes, cremas  y asi tener mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Lissette is a 24-year old mother. She has great hopes that her cosmetics business will do well over the next few years. She started out two years ago when a friend chose this activity for her, and she’s been doing it ever since. 

Lissette works alone and has no fixed schedule. She has difficulties sometimes such as safety concerns or sickness. She isn’t married but she has a partner and three children who attend public school. Her greatest wishes are to have healthy children, to have her eldest son finish primary school, and to obtain a place from which to sell the cosmetics. The loan will be used to buy cosmetics, perfume, and lotions so that she can earn more money.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume, and lotions

loans.name: Dionisia Eusebia

texts.es:
Dionisia  vive en Chincha, Perú. Chincha es nombrado por la  cultura de los Chinchas, célebre por sus avanzados conocimientos de la agricultura y sus proezas marítimas. Hoy en día Chincha es una increíble mezcla de culturas, con una gran población afro-peruana, debido a los restos de un pasado indígena, y las influencias del imperio español. La ciudad, junto a otras ciudades cerca de la costa del Pacífico, fue dañada en el año 2001 y 2007, fechas en las que ocurrieron terremotos de fuerte dimensión, pero ha soportado como siempre lo ha hecho durante gran parte de su historia. En su tiempo libre disfruta ver sus novelas;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Dionisia le gusta mucho es la riquísima “Carapulcra con sopa Seca. Dionisia es madre de 4 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad.

Dionisia trabaja en la venta de cancha, maní, habas,camote, golosinas entre otros, se dedica a este trabajo 5 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 25 clientes en el dia, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene buena sazón y carisma en la atención a sus clientes. 

Dionisia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería, lo que le permitirá tener insumos frescos para la preparación de sus productos y seguir trabajando ofreciendo productos de calidad para asi seguir luchando por cumplir su gran sueño:” poder ofrecer otros productos y crecer como microempresaria."
texts.en:
Dionisia is lives in Chincha, Peru.  Chincha was named after the Chincha people, who are known for their advanced knowledge of agriculture and for their maritime exploits.  Today, Chincha is an incredible mix of cultures, with a large Afro-Peruvian population, which comes from the remnants of an indigenous past and the influence of the Spanish empire.  The city, along with other cities close to the Pacific coast, was damaged in 2001 and 2007 when high-magnitude earthquakes struck.  However, it has endured, just as it always has throughout a large part of its history.  In her free time she likes to watch soap operas.  As everyone knows, Peru is famous for having the most delicious food in the world and one of Dionisia's favorite dishes is the wonderful carapulcra con sopa seca.  Dionisia is the mother of four children, all of whom are now adults.

Dionisia works selling toasted corn, peanuts, broad beans, and candy.  She does this work for five hours a day and she can serve up to 25 customers in one day.  She believes that her business is going well because she seasons her food well and because she is charismatic with her customers.

Dionisia is very thankful to Kiva's lenders, as it is their help that will allow her to buy more merchandise, which will allow her to have fresh ingredients with which to prepare her dishes and keep offering quality products.  This will allow her to keep working toward achieving her greatest dream: to be able to offer other products and to grow as a small businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase corn, peanuts, beans, and sweet potatoes

loans.name: Sexi Virginia

texts.es: Sexi es una mujer de 32 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa su historia empezó ayudando a su esposo y se quedo con el negocio de la venta de ropa, su trabajo lo hace en la tarde y lo realiza recorriendo, si tiene dificultades son la delincuencia y enfermedades, no está casada es unión libre su esposo es jornalero de la constitución, si tiene 2 hijos estudia en escuela fiscal, su sueño más importante es terminar su casa y ayudar a su esposo para la superación de su familia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de ropa y asi comprar vestidos, pantalones, blusas.
texts.en: Sexi, 32, has many hopes of prospering in the next few years by selling clothing.  She began her story helping her husband and stayed with the clothing sales business.  She works in the afternoons traveling around to sell.  Her problems are late payments and illness.  She is not married but is in a common-law marriage with her husband who is a journalist with The Constitution.  They have 2 children in public school.  Her biggest dream is to finish her house and to help her husband get the family ahead.  That is why she wants a loan for her clothing sales and with it she will buy dresses, pants and blouses.

loans.use: to buy dresses, pants and blouses

loans.name: Marianella Victoria

texts.es: Marianella es un mujer de 23 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa empezó por factores económicos y como no tenia ingreso decidió de esta manera obtener dinero y ayuda a su esposo, su trabajo lo hace con su esposo le ayuda los fines de semana, no tiene dificultades, si está casada su esposo es pescador, si tiene 1 hija estudia en escuela fiscal, su sueño más importante es tener establecido en su casa el negocio sin necesidad de salir. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de ropa y asi comprar pantalones, blusas, camisas para su negocio.
texts.en: Marianella is a 23-year-old woman. She has a lot of ambition to succeed in her clothing sales business in the next few years. She started out for financial reasons - since she didn't have an income, she decided to obtain money and help her husband this way. She works with help from her husband on weekends and she doesn't face difficulties. She's married and her husband is a fisherman. She has a daughter who attends a public school. Her most important dream is to establish a home business without the need to go out. That's why she wants the loan for her clothing sales business, so that she can purchase pants, blouses and shirts to sell.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, and shirts.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo surgió por promociones realizadas en la zona, se encuentran en el 9º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2009. Todas ellas son amigas del mismo barrio y se unieron ya que desean poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo en equipo que hacen. Son reconocidas en el barrio por la unión que tienen.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Catalina, ella tiene un kiosko (puesto de ventas) en su casa, el cual está abastecido con todo tipo de productos, como ser bebidas, golosinas, minutas y demás. Gracias a su pequeño negocio ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia para poder cubrir los gastos del día a día. Su meta es poder tener un gran negocio y de esa forma tener más clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, golosinas y demás artículos para poder abastecer su negocio, y de esa forma poder seguir ofreciendo buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group came together after some advertising that was done in the area. They are in their ninth loan cycle and have worked with the Foundation since the year 2009. They are all friends from the same neighborhood, and joined together because they wish to be able to help their families through the work they are doing as a team. They are recognized in the neighborhood for the bond they share. 

One of the group members is Ms. Catalina. She has a "kiosko" (a shop) in her home which is stocked with all kinds of products, such as beverages, sweets, prepared food and other items. Thanks to her small business she has been able to get ahead and help her family cover daily expenses. Her goal is to be able to have a large business and so have more customers. 

She is seeking the loan for the purchase of beverages, sweets, and other items, in order to continue offering a good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase beverages and sweets for sale.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
La  Sra. Clotilde es de Ciudad del Este, está casada, tiene dos  hijos,   ambos en edad escolar, que aun dependen de sus padres.
Ella  tiene un pequeño copetín, cuya venta cada vez más está en ascenso, generándole un buen ingreso, ya que siempre tiene productos frescos que ofrecer a sus clientes. Con la ayuda toda la familia está  saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de galletitas, bebidas y demás productos, para que de esa forma pueda ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación paraguaya y a kiva por la oportunidad de crecimiento que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Clotilde lives in Ciudad del Este. She is married with two children, both of them of school age and still dependent on their parents.
