For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy penknives, cell phone accessories, watches, etc.  Mauricio is confident that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy penknives, cell phone accessories and watches

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una granja y tiene criadero de gallina y de pollo, es muy conocido en la localidad por lo tanto es muy solicitado su producto, últimamente ha aumentado más la demanda pues los pollos y los huevos que vende son de muy buena calidad y a precios excelentes, además el servicio es único, Miguel siempre está muy contento y a la disposición de la clientela; es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto siempre a aprovechar oportunidades porque quiere superarse, piensa que siempre hay que trabajar y hacer lo que se puede hasta el final y él está totalmente decidido es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar más gallinas, pollos y concentrado. Miguel Ángel tiene la esperanza que así logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel is 57 years old and lives together with his life partner and children.  He owns a farm and raises hens and chickens.  He is very well known in his town and his products are very much in demand.  He has recently experienced an increase in demand as the chickens and eggs that he sells are very good quality and he sells them at excellent prices.  In addition, his service is very good.

Miguel is always very happy and at his customers' disposal.  He is an entrepreneurial man who is always ready to make the most of opportunities because he wants to do well.  He believes that you must always work and do what you can right up to the end and he is completely committed.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy more hens, chickens and concentrated feed.  He hopes that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hens, chickens and concentrated feed

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es: Zonia de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus cinco hijos. Ella posee una tortillería en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues sus tortillas son preparadas con material de primera calidad y a un buen precio, además son las que se entregan más rápido y calientitas; Zonia es una mujer muy activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante y triunfar, piensa que hay que prometerse ser siempre fuertes y constantes, para  al final del camino tener éxito y felicidad, está dispuesta a lograrlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor a fin de bajar el costo de materia prima y que su ganancia sean mejores. Zonia tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Zonia is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and five children.  She has a tortilla business in her home and is very well known in her area.  She has a lot of customers because her tortillas are made with good-quality ingredients and sold at a good price.  In addition, they are served very quickly and still warm.  Zonia is a very active woman who has a great desire to do well and succeed.  She believes that you must always remain strong and persevere if you want to be successful and happy at the end of the day and she is ready to do this.

Zonia is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy corn wholesale.  This will reduce the cost of her ingredients and she will make more profits.  Zonia believes that this will enable her to provide her family with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Evelyn Elizabeth

texts.es: Evelyn Elizabeth de veintisiete años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar donde reside, ahí vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, leche, entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de más clientela pues todo lo que comercía es producto de primera calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable; Evelyn es una mujer entregada al trabajo y con mucho entusiasmo de triunfar, piensa que la fuerza más grande para lograr ese éxito es la voluntad, tiene toda lo que necesita, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, bebidas, papel etc. Evelyn Elizabeth tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Evelyn Elizabeth is twenty-seven years old and she lives with her life's companion and her children. She has a store located in her home. There she sells basic necessity products such as rice, beans, milk, and more. Lately she has gained more customers because everything she sells is of the best quality and at very accessible prices. In addition, the service is un equaled. Evelyn is a woman who is very dedicated to her work who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead. She thinks that the biggest strength for success is her will and she has she needs. That is why she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, snacks, bread, drinks, paper, etc. Evelyn Elizabeth is confident that in this way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, beverages, and paper.

loans.name: María Celia

texts.es: María Celia de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia. Ella posee una panadería en el lugar de su residencia la cual es muy visitada por las personas del lugar, últimamente ha tenido más demanda, pues su producto es delicioso hecho con material de excelente calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer activa, muy enérgica se levanta desde muy temprano a comenzar su labor, tiene  muchas metas que se ha propuesto alcanzar  y está dispuesta a lograrlo, piensa que para tener éxito, la actitud es igual de importante que la habilidad, y ella tiene toda la actitud positiva, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, levadura, bandejas entre otros. María Celia tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar a su hogar una mejor situación económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
María Celia is 49 years old and lives together with her life partner in her own home.  She has a bakery in her home which is very popular with local people.  She has recently experienced an increase in demand as her products are delicious.  They are made from top-quality ingredients and sold at really affordable prices.  In addition, her service is excellent.

María is an active woman who is full of energy.  She gets up very early in the morning to start her work.  She has many goals which she has set herself and she is ready to achieve them.  She believes that, in order to be successful, your attitude is just as important as your skill.  María's attitude is all positive.  

María decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that she could buy flour wholesale, sugar, yeast, trays, etc.  She is certain that this will enable her to put her household in a better financial situation and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour wholesale, sugar, yeast and trays

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: Nelson Antonio de 33 años de edad, habita junto a su familia, la cual está conformada por su esposa y un hijo el cual  se encuentra estudiando. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace más de 6 años.  Vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, café, azúcar, jabón, bebidas, papel, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Su sueño es ver a su hijo convertido como un gran profesional, con mejores oportunidades a las que él tuvo. Todo esto le da fuerza a esforzarse cada día más, ya que no pierde la esperanza de que un día su sueño se haga realidad. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su tienda en la compra de mercadería al por mayor, con el fin de aumentar su inventario que le permita atraer a más clientes y mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos.  Esto lo ha llevado a considerar la solicitud de este crédito a INTEGRAL para llevar a cabo su plan. Con el crédito comprará variedad de productos de tienda como: café, aceite, bebidas, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. Tiene mucha confianza que de esta forma logrará lo que tanto anhela.
texts.en:
Nelson Antonio is 33 years old and lives with his family (his wife and his son who is in school).  Nelson has been running a store for more than six years.  He sells a variety of basic household products such as rice, beans, coffee, sugar, soap, drinks, toilet paper and other products that his customers want.  His dream is to see his son become a great professional with better opportunities than he had.  This gives him the strength to work harder and harder every day because he hopes that one day his dream will come true.

Nelson has decided to invest in his store by purchasing merchandise wholesale.  This will increase his stock, allowing him to attract more customers and improve his sales and income. He decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can carry out his plan.  He will use his loan to buy a variety of products for his store such as coffee, oil, drinks, candies, sugar, rice, beans and other products which will attract more customers.  He is very confident that this will enable him to achieve everything he hopes to.

loans.use: to buy coffee, oil, drinks, candies, sugar, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: María Luz

texts.es: María Luz de 56 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad es soltera y vive sola. Ella se dedica al comercio de ropa. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas donde ella habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia.  María se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora ya que tiene muchas ideas de negocio  y poco a poco va poniendo en  marcha. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener activo su negocio por más de 5 años. Gracias a su carisma se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas que la prefieren ya que ella siempre trata de tener variedad y buenos precios en las prendas de vestir que ofrece. Además tiene para todos los gustos y preferencias. Su sueño es mantener su negocio surtido con variedad de prendas de vestir con el objetivo de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de prendas de vestir (faldas, pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa interior, etc.), con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables.
texts.en:
María Luz is 56 years old and lives in her home which she owns.  She is single and lives alone.  Her business is selling clothing.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor in the main areas near her home.  María has been in this business for many years and she has a lot of experience.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who has many business ideas which she is gradually putting into practice.  With a lot of effort and commitment, she has managed to keep her business running for more than five years.  Thanks to her charm, she has gained the trust of many people who are loyal to her business because she always tries to have a good variety of products available and sells them at good prices.  She has products to suit every taste.

María's dream is to keep her business stocked with a good variety of clothing so that she can attract more customers.  This will allow her to improve her quality of life.  She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, buying garments such as skirts, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, etc.  She thereby hopes to improve her living conditions  She trusts in God that she will have favorable results.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es: Enrique de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una panadería en el lugar de su residencia y es muy conocido en la localidad, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el pan que comercia es de muy buena calidad, con un sabor exquisito y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es único; Enrique es un hombre entregado a su labor con muchas metas por alcanzar, piensa que la motivación es lo que te ayuda a empezar, pero es el hábito el que te mantiene firme en el camino, tiene todo lo necesario, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, dulce, gas propano entre otros. Enrique tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Enrique is 54 years old, lives with his partner and children in their own home. He owns a bakery in his home and is well known in his area. He has a lot of clientele since he sells high quality, delicious bread at reasonable prices. In addition to that he is the only one who offers this business. Enrique is a dedicated man to his work with many goals to achieve. He believes motivation is the first step to beginning something but its habits that maintain a firm finish. He has all of the necessities which is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale flour, sugar, candies, propane gas etc. Enrique has high hopes that with this support he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale flour, sugar, candies, propane gas etc

loans.name: Ana Teresa

texts.es: Ana Teresa de 43 años de edad, reside junto a su grupo familiar  el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus dos hijos de 15 y 7 años de edad, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ana  se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, honesta y con muchos deseos de superarse. Para ella lo más importante es su familia. No pierde las esperanzas de algún día ver a sus hijos convertidos en  profesionales y con mejores oportunidades de vida. Esto es lo que inspira a Ana  a trabajar duramente en su tienda  que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya logró ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. El objetivo de Ana es ampliar su negocio de tal manera que la capacidad del mismo sea más grande y lógre cubrir una mayor demanda. Esta inversión piensa hacerla por medio de un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para hacerlo por sus medios. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar productos de tienda al por mayor (aceite, café, jabón, pan dulce, golosinas, arroz, frijoles, etc.) para surtir su tienda y poder lográr su objetivo. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que así será.
texts.en: Ana Teresa is 43 years old and lives together with her family which is made up of her husband and her two children who are 15 and 7 years old and in school.  Ana is a hard-working, honest woman who has a great desire to do well.  Her family is the most important thing in the world to her.  She doesn't lose hope of some day seeing her children become professionals with better opportunities in life.  This is what inspires her to work hard in her store which she worked hard to set up.  She has been in this business for a long time and has managed to gain the trust of many people.  Ana's goal is to expand her business so that she has greater capacity and can satisfy greater demand.  She plans to make this investment with the aid of a loan because she doesn't have the necessary resources to do it herself.  She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy products for her store wholesale (oil, coffee, soap, sweet bread, candies, rice, beans, etc.).  She will use these products to stock her store and achieve her goal.  She trusts in almighty God that she will succeed.

loans.use: to buy oil, coffee, soap, sweet bread, candies, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: Leydi Liliana

texts.es:
Leydi Liliana tiene 28 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con un hijo. Vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla EL SAGRADO CORAZON, esta ventanilla se encuentra ubicada en el sector de las calles Ernesto Briones y Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica al Comercio.

La Señora Leydi se dedica al negocio de Yambal, es decir a la venta de cosméticos por medio de revistas y a dar asesoría de belleza. El dinero es para invertir en cosmeticos de Yambal para exivir en el local.

Las compras de los insumos las realiza en la ciudad de Guayaquil por medio de correo electrónico. El crédito les ayudado a aumentar la producción y tener productos de calidad, el sueño de Leydi es tener un local propio, ha enfrentado desafíos como los precios altos y la competencia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer la limpieza en el hogar.
texts.en:
Leydi Liliana is 28 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and son. She lives in Cantón Ventanas in the Province of Los Rios. 

Her communal banking group is called El Sagrado Corazón (Sacred Heart).  This bank is located on the corner of Ernesto Briones and Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, in the town of Cantón Ventanas.  Her group is dedicated to commerce.

Mrs. Leydi dedicates herself to the business of selling Yambal brand cosmetics.  That is, the selling of cosmetics by means of magazines and the giving of beauty advice. The money is for investing in Yambal cosmetics in order to promote them locally.

She does her purchasing in the city of Guayaquil via email.  The loan helps her to increase production and improve the quality of her products.  Leydi's dream is to have her own local store.  She has faced challenges such as high prices and competition.  

In her free time, she likes to do housekeeping in her home.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar Armando de 51 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto con su esposa y dos hijos los cuales  ya son mayores de edad. Él se dedica a la compra  de chatarra al clientes de casa en casa y al acumularla vende a recolectores que reciclan y la procesan para reutilizarla, la actividad de recoleccion la realiza en las principales zonas donde  habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a ella por lo que ya tiene experiencia  y algunos clientes fijos que confían plenamente en él ya que es un hombre responsable y trabajador. Su sueño es dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida por lo que ha decidido invertir en su única fuente de ingreso y de tal forma que esto le permita aumentar sus niveles de ingresos que lo lleven a alcanzar su sueño. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar chatarra al por mayor que le permita abastecer una mayor demanda.  Él es un hombre muy trabajador y creyente el cual confía que de esta forma logrará el sueño de su vida.
texts.en:
Oscar Armando is 51 years old and lives in his family home together with his wife and two children who are already adults.  His business is buying scrap metal from customers, house to house, and then selling it to collectors who recycle it and process it so that it can be re-used.  He carries out his collections in the main areas near his home. 

Oscar has been in this business for many years and so he already has experience and some regular customers who have complete trust in him because he is a responsible and hard-working man.  His dream is to provide his family with better living conditions and so he has decided to invest in his only source of income so that he can increase his income and achieve his dream.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy scrap metal wholesale.  This will allow him to satisfy greater demand.  Oscar is a very hard-working man of strong faith who believes that he will be able to achieve his dream in this way.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal wholesale

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 50 years old and married with 8 children. With 4 children in school, Daisy works very hard to provide for them.

Daisy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of  PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Daisy has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, toothpaste, spices, sardines, etc. 

In the future, Daisy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Merlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a variety store and from raising livestock. Merlinda is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and to repair her fishing boat.

Merlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to buy additional fishing boats.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and to repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.en:
Aracely is married with eight children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Aracely is 38 years old and has one child who is in school.

Aracely has a variety store business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more rice, detergent and other miscellaneous items.

She has been in this business for 3 years. Aracely would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, detergent and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario Alberto de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee un taller de estructura metálica en el lugar de su residencia, hace puertas, balcones, portones y todo lo que pidan sus clientes en metal, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente pues su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y todo a excelentes precios, además su servicio es inigualable; Mario es un hombre trabajador con muchos sueños por realizar, piensa que el éxito no es la clave de la felicidad, sino que la felicidad es la clave del éxito y con ese pensamiento tan acertado, es que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar metal por mayor. Mario Alberto tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Mario Alberto is 40 years old, lives with his life partner and children in their home. He owns a metal shop in his home. He makes doors, balconies, gates, and anything made of metal his clients request. His clientele has grown lately since he makes high quality pieces, offers them at reasonable prices, and his service is unbeatable. Mario is a hardworking man with many dreams to achieve. He believes that success is not the key to happiness but that happiness is what brings success. Its with this mentality that he decided to request INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale metal. Mario Alberto has high hopes that with this he will be able to offer his family a plentiful life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale metal.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia de 37 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su esposo y sus dos hijos los cuales son mayores de edad. Ana se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir para todos los gustos y preferencias. La venta de sus confecciones las realiza de manera ambulante en los alrededores de la zona donde ella habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a dicha actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y muchos clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más, ya que es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable y sobre todo carismática. Su familia es su principal inspiración para trabajar día a día y recorrer los diferentes lugares para ofrecer su producto. Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para  invertir en su negocio en la compra de telas, hilos, elásticos, botones, etc. de tal manera que pueda cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar su nivel de ventas y de ingresos. Además confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables y logrará el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Julia is 37 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two grown children. Ana Julia makes and sells all types of garments. She sells her clothing door to door around the area where she lives. Ana Julia has been in the same line of work for many years so she has a lot of experience and a reliable clientele, who are more dedicated to her everyday because she is a hard-working, responsible and charismatic woman. 

Her family is the main inspiration for her to work every day and to visit different places in order to sell her products. Her dream is to improve the standard of living of her family and that is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. She wants to invest in her business by buying fabric, thread, elastic, buttons. This will allow her to meet a larger demand and increase her sales and her income. She trusts in God that the results will be good and that she will achieve her goal of increasing her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María es un mujer de 26 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida su historia empezó hace 3 años los fines de semana vende salchicha en el mercado y le va bien, su trabajo lo hace sola de las 7:30 hasta la hora que termine, si tiene dificultades que se les enfermen sus hijas, no está casada tiene unión libre, el esposo es despachador de la coop. Guayas, si tiene 2 hijas, su sueño más importante es incrementar sus ventas y tener casa propia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar carnes, verduras, frutas para la venta de comida.
texts.en:
María is a 26-year-old woman who has a great desire to boost her food business over the next few years.

María started her business three years ago, selling sausage in the market on weekends.  The business is doing very well.  She works alone from 7.30am until she runs out.  Her difficulties are when her children become sick.  María is not married.  She lives with her common-law husband who is a dispatcher for the Guayas co-op.  She has two daughters.  María's biggest dream is to increase her sales and own her own home.  She would like a loan to buy meat, vegetables and fruit for her food business.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables and fruit for her food business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit, plantains and vegetables

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 65 years old and married with 11 children.

Clarita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business making sawali, or walls made from interwoven splits of bamboo, in the Philippines.  She has requested a loan of PHP 16000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for this business.

Clarita has borrowed and repaid 10 previous loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sawali-making business for 43 years. She also earns an income from dressmaking.

Clarita aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Sandra Del Transito

texts.es: Sandra del Transito de 36 años de edad, habita junto a sus 4 hijos los cuales son menores de edad. Sandra es  muy trabajadora, dedicada y luchadora. Hace ya varios años que logro establecer un pequeño puesto frente al Mercado Municipal de la zona donde habita, en el cual vende variedad de frutas y verduras. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha mantenido su negocio y gracias a Dios y al arduo trabajo que día a día realiza los resultados obtenidos han sido favorables. Además su carisma es incomparable, para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy concurrida y visitada por muchas personas, en especial el negocio de Sandra  ya que cada día son más las personas que se acercan en busca de los productos que ella ofrece. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma ha llevado el pan de cada día a su hogar. Por todo lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras (papas, cebollas, tomates, zanahorias, sandías, naranjas, limones, aguacates, piñas, etc.) de tal forma que pueda lograr su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Sandra  guarda un profundo agradecimiento con INTEGRAL ya que gracias a la confianza que le prestaron en el pasado logró establecer su negocio y seguir operando. Espera que esta vez la institución deposite nuevamente la confianza en ella con el nuevo préstamo.
texts.en:
Sandra del Transito is 36 years old and lives with her 4 young children. She is a fighter and a very hardworking woman. A few years ago she was able to open her own stand in front of the Municipal Market in her town, where she sells many types of fruit and vegetables. With much effort and dedication she has been able to maintain the business and thanks to God and the hard work she performs every day, the results have been very positive. 

Besides her amazing charisma, the most important thing to Sandra is her customers' satisfaction with the service they receive. Her business is located in a very busy area with a lot of foot traffic. Every day more people come looking for the products that she sells. Her dream is to continue to keep her business active because it is her primary source of income and has allowed her to provide for her family. 

This is why she has decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL. She plans to invest in her business by buying more fruits and vegetables (potatoes, onions, tomatoes, carrots, watermelon, oranges, lemons, avocados, pineapples and more) and hopefully achieve her goal of improving the standard of living of her family. Sandra is very grateful to INTEGRAL for the trust they placed in her by giving her a loan to start and to operate her business. She hopes they will trust her again and give her a new loan.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions, tomatoes, carrots, watermelons, oranges, lemons, avocados, pineapples and more.

loans.name: Jorge Pantaleón

texts.es: Jorge Pantaleón habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su querida esposa. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace ya varios años. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica ya que es muy transitada, en especial la tienda de Jorge ya que gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita. Jorge  tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio por mucho tiempo, por lo que siempre trata de mantenerse un paso adelante de la competencia y es así como ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales manifiestan estar satisfechos con el servicio prestado. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tienda y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: frijoles, azúcar, arroz, leche, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. Con  la fe puesta en Dios que de esta manera logrará mejorar sus niveles de ventas y de  ingresos que por consecuencia le ayudarán a mejorar su condición de vida y la de su  familia.
texts.en:
Jorge Pantaleón lives with his wife in their own home. He has owned a store for several years. His business is in a very strategic location, in a very busy area. Thanks to his charisma, Jorge has been able to win the trust of many people in the area where he lives. He has a lot of ideas for his business, which he has been putting into effect little by little. His dream is to keep running his business for many years, which is why he always tries to be a step ahead of his competition. He has already won the trust of his neighbors, who seems to be very satisfied with the service they receive in his store. 

He is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in his store and stock it with all kinds of products: beans, sugar, rice, milk, candies, oil, paper, detergent and other products that will help him widen his selection and attract more customers. He trusts in God that he will be able to increase his sales and income and improve his and his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, rice, milk, candies, oil, paper, detergent and more.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa María de veintiséis años de edad vive al lado de su padres. Ella tiene un puesto en el mercado municipal de la localidad donde reside y se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues tiene variedad de productos de buena calidad y a precios accesibles; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora con grandes metas por delante, piensa  que la acción es el paso fundamental para llegar al éxito; quiere dar ese paso, por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras y frutas por mayor, especies, granos básicos entre otros. Rosa María tienen fe que con su labor podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa María is 26 years old and lives with her parents. She has a locale in the town market where she lives and lately her clientele has grown since she has a variety of products at reasonable prices. Rosa is a resourceful woman with many goals ahead of her. She believes that action is the fundamental step to success. She wants to have that first step which is why she requested INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale vegetables, fruits, spices, basic grains, etc. Rosa María has faith that with her hard work she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale vegetables, fruits, spices, basic grains, etc

loans.name: Rubenia De Jesús

texts.es: Rubenia de Jesús de 32 años de edad, habita junto con su grupo familiar el cual lo conforman su compañero de de vida de 32 años y sus dos hijos de 13 y 6 años. Ella se dedica al comercio de productos por catalogo y a la elaboración de hermosas prendas de vestir. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse  a esta actividad por lo que ya posee amplia experiencia en el mercado de la costura y venta de los mismos. Es muy reconocida en la zona donde habita ya que gracias a su carisma y dedicación en su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada día la prefieren más. La señora Rubenia  trabaja muy duro para colaborar un poco con la economía del hogar ya que los ingresos recibidos por su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir las necesidades de toda la familia que cada vez son mayores. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y su mayor deseo es dar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Esta es la razón por la cual ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio con el fin de mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo y seguir recibiendo los frutos del mismo. El crédito lo quiere para comprar la materia prima necesaria (cosméticos, telas, hilos, elástico, botones, tijeras, agujas, etc.) para mantener abastecido su negocio de tal forma que pueda cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado.  Espera y confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables y logrará su objetivo de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rubenia de Jesús is 32 years old and lives with her family which includes her 32 year old companion and her children, aged 13 and 6. She makes a living selling products from a catalog and sewing beautiful garments. She has been in this line of work for many years and has a lot of experience in the clothing market and sales. She is well-known in the area where she lives and thanks to her charisma and her dedication to her work she has won the trust and the loyalty of many customers.  

Rubenia works very hard in order to contribute to the household budget. Her husband's income is not enough to cover all of their expenses which seem to be bigger every day. Her family is the most important thing to Rubenia and her greatest wish is to give a better future to her children. That is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL. She will invest it in her business in order to keep it running  and to keep enjoying the fruits of her labor. She will use the loan to buy materials (makeup, fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, scissors, needles) to keep her business in stock and to reach a larger portion of the market. She trusts in God and hopes to get good results and to achieve her goal of giving her family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy makeup, fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, scissors, needles, etc.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is a hard-working entrepreneur who sells salted and fermented fish in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her salted and fermented fish business.

Ailyn has been in this business for 2 years. Ailyn earns additional income from charcoal sales.

Ailyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her salted/fermented fish business.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es:
José es un joven emprendedor de 24 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, actualmente se encuentra viviendo en casa de sus padres, la casa en la que vive se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Morrope, en donde los pobladores se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería exclusivamente, es un caserío donde habitan un aproximado de 100 familias. 

José desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado al trabajo diario y es por eso que hoy él se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como ganado ovino, caprino, y aves de corral, negocio que lo realiza en los mercados locales así como en los que están en caserío cercanos al suyo, adicionalmente se dedica la agricultura para lo que tiene sembrado cultivo de arroz, actividades a las que se dedica ya un aproximado de 6 años, y es que cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres en algunas actividades por lo que el quiere corresponderles con darles una mejor calidad de vida.

Ahora él esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2500 Nuevos Soles los cuales los utilizará para la compra de fertilizantes para sus cultivos y alimentos balanceados para sus animales con los cuales les dará un mejor engorde y a la vez un mas rápido crecimiento para su comercialización.

José es un joven emprendedor que se ha hecho muy conocido en la zona por la gran responsabilidad que tiene con su trabajo y con su familia.
texts.en:
José is a 24 year old entrepreneur. He is single, does not have any children and lives with his parents. Their home is in the Morrope district, where most people work in agriculture and livestock. It is a village of about 100 families. 

Since he was very young, José has worked everyday and that is why now he works raising and selling animals like cows, sheep, goats and poultry. He sells the animals in the local markets and also in nearby villages. He also farms and has planted a rice harvest. He's being doing this work for the last 6 years. He relies on his parents to help him with certain tasks and he would like to be able to give them a better standard of living. 

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa which he will use to buy fertilizer for his crops and feed for his animals. The feed will help them fatten up and grow more quickly which will make them more profitable to sell. José is a young entrepreneur who is well-known in the area for being very responsible in his work and with his family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
El señor Raul, es conviviente, su pareja trabaja como ama de casa desde hace algún tiempo y esta actividad le permite generar ingresos para ella y su pequeña familia. Por el momento no tienen bebes y esta situación les permite enfocarse en sí mismos y fortalecerse como una nueva unidad.

Raul se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte público en la ciudad de Ica, trabaja un promedio de 13 horas, tiempo en el que atiende a 60 aproximadamente. Lamentablemente hace poco tiempo Raul extravío todos sus documentos y ahora se le dificulta el trabajo debido a que las autoridades constantemente solicitan la licencia de conducir, revisión técnica y todo ese tipo de documentos. Actualmente Raul no tiene mucha facilidad en el momento de llevar a cabo su trabajo, es por eso que ha recurrido al programa Kiva y desea  que los prestamistas puedan apoyarlo en la tramitación de sus documentos extraviados y así pueda trabajar completamente tranquilo en todos los lugares que considere necesario.

En estos años, Raul ha pensado siempre en mejorar y a tenido la idea de tener un propio negocio en casa para que su esposa se dediquen a este, es por eso que en estos momento desean trabajar duro para poder juntar el dinero necesario y realizar esta meta familiar, por otro lado ambos desean comprar un propio auto para que sus ingresos sean superiores a los que ya tiene.
texts.en:
Raul lives with his partner who has been working as a housewife for some time.  This allows her to make income for herself and her small family.  Right now, Raul and his partner do not have any children and this allows them to focus on themselves and strengthen their relationship as a new couple.

Raul provides a public transport service in the city of Ica.  He works an average of 13 hours a day and serves approximately 60 customers in this time.  Unfortunately, a short while ago Raul lost all his documents and now his work is becoming difficult because the authorities are constantly asking him for his driver's license, his vehicle maintenance records and all these types of documents.  Raul's work is currently difficult to carry out and so he has turned to the Kiva program for help.  He would like lenders to support him in replacing his lost documents so that he can work peacefully.

Over the years, Raul has always planned to improve himself and he has plans to set up a business in his home for his wife to work in.  The couple are working hard so that they can get together the money they need and achieve this family goal.  They would also both like to buy a car so that they can increase their current income.

loans.use: to replace his lost documents

loans.name: Marta Lorena

texts.es:
Marta Lorena vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada desamparados, en la provincia de San Jose, capital de Costa Rica. En esta zona cuenta con una amplia gama de hoteles y le ofrece al turista museos, restaurantes, parques, volcanes centros de conferencias, modernos centros comerciales, cines, teatros, galerías y mucha y variada diversión nocturna. Dentro de las principales atracciones culturales se encuentra el Teatro Nacional, situado en la Plaza de la Cultura e inaugurado en 1897, el Museo del Oro, el Museo de Arte y Diseño Contemporáneo y el Museo de los Niños. Algunas de las más famosas fiestas y celebraciones de la provincia de San José son las fiestas populares de fin y principio de cada año, el Festival de La Luz, en el mes de diciembre y la exposición nacional de orquídeas, en el mes de marzo.

Marta Lorena se dedica desde hace siete años a la sastrería, ya que es modista profesional. Ha sentido un gran apoyo por parte de su familia y los vecinos de la comunidad. Ella desea hacer crecer su negocio, para asi tener más ingresos económicos y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Es por esto que Marta Lorena está solicitando el monto de 100,000.00 (cien mil colones), para la compra de mercadería para su taller entre ellos materiales como telas, hilos y elásticos, ya que quiere continuar dando el mejor servicio de sastrería de su comunidad y asi obtener más clientes.

Marta Lorena es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Rincón Grande S.A, este será su cuarto préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Marta Lorena lives with her family in a community called "Desamparados" in the province of San José, the capital of Costa Rica. In this area there are a wide range of hotels and the zone offers tourist museums, restaurants, parks, volcanos, conference centers, modern malls, movies, theatres, galleries, and a lot of variety and fun nightlife. Among the main cultural attractions is the Teatro Nacional (National Theatre), located in the Plaza de la Cultura (Plaza of culture) which was inagurated in 1897, el Museo de Oro (the Gold Museum), el Museo de Arte y Diseño Contemporáneo (the Museum of Art and Contemporary Design), and el Museo de los Niños (the Children's Museum). 

Some of the most famous parties and celebrations in the province of San José are the popular parties at the end and the beginning of each year, el Festival de La Luz (the Festival of Light) in the month of December, and the national orchid exposition in the month of March.

Marta Lorena has been dedicated to her work as a tailor for 7 years. She is a professional dressmaker. She has felt great support from her family and  neighbors in the community. She wishes to make her business grow, in order to have more economic income and to provide a better quality of life to her family.

For this reason, Marta Lorena is requesting the amount of 100,000.00 colones ($200USD), in order to buy the materials for her shop, including items like fabrics, threads, and elastics, since she wants to continue giving the best tailoring service to her community and thus obtain more clients.

Marta Lorena is a member of the communal banking group Rincón Grande S.A. This will be her fourth loan, and she is very grateful for the opportunities of access to credit that the group provides so that she can carry out her life's projects.

loans.use: To purchase materials for making clothes

loans.name: Santa Isabel Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Isabel está formado por  seis mujeres emprendedoras,  decidieron nombrarse así porque todas viven en esa área.
Dentro de las integrantes se encuentra Noemi de 41 años, quien está casada y tiene 3 hijos (18, 13,9) que están estudiando;  ella dedica a la venta de manzanas, bombones y chocolates.  Comenzó en el negocio hace tres años a causa de los problemas de salud de su esposo y debía generar ingresos para  mantener a su familia y ser el pilar de su hogar; aunado a esto, por temas de salud de uno de sus hijos necesitaba comprar más medicamento.
El sueño de Noemi es vender mucha mercancía para poder rentar un local en el que pueda establecerse mejor, contar con publicidad (ya que actualmente no tiene), darse a conocer en otros estados del país; con su meta alcanzada ella podrá asegurar el futuro de su familia y proveer estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The 'Santa Isabel' group is made up of six entrepreneurial women.  They decided to give their group this name because they all live in the area of the same name.

One of the group's members is 41-year-old Noemi who is married and has three children (18, 13 and 9) who are all studying.  Her business is selling candied apples, sweets and chocolates. She started out in this business three years ago as her husband was suffering health problems.  She managed to make enough income to support her household and become the pillar of her family.  However, one of her children also suffered health problems and she needed to buy more medicines.

Noemi's dream is to sell a lot of merchandise so that she can rent premises in which to better establish her business.  She would also like to market her business (she currently doesn't have any publicity) and become known in other states.  With her goal achieved, she will be able to guarantee her family's future and provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in Canti

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a dry goods business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years now, and also earns additional income from E-loading and frozen foods.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like slippers, toys and other dry goods. In the future, Elsa would like to save enough money so she could send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items like slippers, toys and other dry goods.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 52 years old and married with 5 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell. She has been running the sari sari store for 5 years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal and peanuts.

Marilyn has borrowed and paid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Ruby

texts.en:
Ruby is 26 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more products to sell in her general store.

Ruby has borrowed and paid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from clothing sales. She aspires to save enough money to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 55 years old, married and has 4 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. In the future, Rosie would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Rufio

texts.en: This time Rufio is borrowing Php 25,000 to fund his livestock business. The livestock business that he previously funded through NWTF and KIVA continues to provide him and his family with income that is improving their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase feed, hogs and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is 64 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them. Rita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy more products to sell in her general store.

Rita has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as soft-drinks, detergents and other groceries. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rachelle

texts.en:
Rachelle works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 6 years now, and also earns additional income from food vending.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her community. In the future, Rachelle would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her community.

loans.name: Yoeurn

texts.en:
Yoeurn, 46, is widowed and resides with a daughter in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and vegetables to sell for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her daughter is employed in a garment factory and earns about USD 4 per day. 

Due to their present house being too old, Yoeurn wants to repair it to make it stronger and bigger in order to provide better living conditions for the family. With this goal in mind, Yoeurn is requesting a loan of USD 400 to purchase timbers for repairing her house. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business.

loans.use: to purchase timbers for repairing her house.

loans.name: Lwanzo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Masika, leader du groupe d’affaire «Lwanzo », est  entrepreneur, âgée de 38  ans, femme vivant seule, mère de 6  jeunes enfants, qui étudient tous avec l’appui d’un organisme de charité DON BOSCO. Elle est vendeuse de boissons.  Il y a  16 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  3eme  crédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  4 casiers de Primus, aigle, Fanta,  etc.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement, accroitre son entreprise et acheter une parcelle puis y construire une maison pour ses enfants. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique. En  distance, il y a un enfant derrière les membres du groupe qui était de passage lors de la photographie.
texts.en:
The client, Masika, is the Lwanzo group's leader. She is a 38-year-old entrepreneur who lives alone and is the mother of 6 young children, who all go to school thanks to the support of the Don Bosco charity.

Masika sells drinks and has been doing this type of revenue-generating activity for 16 years. She has just received her 3rd loan, which should serve to buy 4 cases of drinks like Primus, Aigle, Fanta, etc. She would also like to see her children grow up comfortably, expand her business and buy a plot of land on which she will then build a house for her children. 

The customer thanks Hekima for it's support of poor women excluded from regular bank lending channels.

Note: in the background, behind the group members, is a small child who happened to be walking past when the picture was taken.

loans.use: to buy 4 cases of drinks like Primus, Aigle, Fanta, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Sukhbat

texts.en:
Mr. Sukhbat, 31, makes work clothes in his tailoring shop. He lives with his wife and his 2 children in the slum district in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running his shop for 5 years nonstop, and before that he used to work as a sewer in other tailoring companies. 

At first he started his business alone with just 2 sewing machines and some other old equipment, but now his tailoring shop has 4 employees who are hired workers. Sukhbat always wants to expand and improve his business day by day. 

At this time he wants to purchase new equipment for his shop, such as a button-machine. He thinks it will ease their jobs and their output will be notably increased. Therefore, he will use his loan to cover the cost of a button-machine to ease his tailoring jobs.

loans.use: To cover the cost of a button-machine to ease his tailoring jobs.

loans.name: Marlne

texts.en: Marlne is 66 years old. She is a mother of 4 children who are all enrolled in school. She has been making andazi for 1 year. With the loan she will buy more baking powder and sugar to make more andazi. She plans to pay school fees for the children as well as to provide food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more baking powder to make andazi.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline is 37 years old and has 4 children, all of whom attend school.  Her husband is a farmer.  Jacqueline has been selling a variety of products for the last 5 years. With the loan she would like to buy more rice, sugar and maize flour for sale in the shop.  She hopes to use the profits to pay school fees and to renovate the house.  In the future, she would like to continue expanding her inventory.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, rice and maize flour for sale.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad  is a 26 year old married man from Gaza.  In 2008, Ahmad started working as a tailor in his own small shop.   He hopes to get this loan in order to buy new sewing machines for his shop. He hopes that this loan will improve his business and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy new sewing machines for the shop

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married, and has six children. He has been an owner of a workshop where he has been repairing cars since 2002. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation, and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

Safaa is requesting a $2,400 loan in order to pay the annual rent for his shop. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his shop.

loans.name: Wassim

texts.en:
Wassim is a 39-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and three children, who are all studying. He’s more than happy to be supportive and helpful to his family, even though he’s working hard and nonstop. Wassim has many years of experience in the agriculture field and started to work on his own tractor in 1995. 

Today, he seeks to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform needed maintenance on his tractor. He notes that this will allow him to carry on his work properly.  In the future, he plans to buy land and improve his cultivation.

loans.use: to perform needed maintenance on his tractor.

loans.name: Marame

texts.fr: Madame Madame est une femme de 41 ans qui habite dans l’une des banlieues du territoire sénégalais. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce et gère une cantine au marché de sa localité ou elle vend des légumes et autres condiments divers. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité  et a pour objectif la diversification de ses sources de  revenus. Elle est sociétaire au sein d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis8 mois. Il sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs. Son crédit a un double objet. Une partie du financement sera utilisée  pour la réfection de sa cantine et  l’autre partie servira à s’approvisionner en légumes pour les besoins de son commerce. Ce  financement  pourra l’aider a améliorer son cadre de travail et accroitre ses bénéfices en vue d’un meilleur soutien envers son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Marame is 41 years old and lives in one of Senegal's suburbs. She works in the commercial sector, running a small shop at her local market, where she sells vegetables and various condiments. She chose her line of work out of necessity and aims to diversify her revenue sources.

She has been a member of a UIMCEC branch for 8 months and is requesting a loan of 100 000 francs. The purpose of her loan is twofold; part of the loan will be used to repair her small shop, and part of it will be used to buy vegetables for her business. This loan could help her improve her working environment and increase her profits, with a view to better supporting her husband with the meeting of their children's needs.

loans.use: to repair her small shop and buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Deysi Del Carmen

texts.es:
Daysi, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, pupusas y comida, vive con su esposo y una nieta, tiene aproximadamente 25 años de estar en el negocio, lo aprendió por su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de cocina, para elaborar los productos, condimentos, maíz, aceite, pollo, chicharrón, carnes, tomates, cebollas, gas, entre otros que son muy necesarios para mejorar y aumentar la producción.
El objetivo de Daysi es mejorar y mantener el negocio por un largo tiempo, mejorando los ingresos y que su familia tenga una vida más estable.
texts.en:
Daysi's business is selling soft drinks, pupusas and other food.  She lives with her husband and a granddaughter.  She has been in her business for approximately 25 years and learned from her family.

Daysi is requesting a loan to buy supplies for making her food: seasonings, corn, oil, chicken, chicharrón (fried pork rinds), meat, tomatoes, onions, gas and other products that she needs to improve and increase her production.

Daysi's goal is to improve and maintain her business over the long term, improving her income and providing her family with a more stable life.

loans.use: to buy seasonings, corn, oil, chicken, chicharrón and meat

loans.name: Firass

texts.en:
Firass is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, single and has two children.

Firass is an owner of a food market since 2000.  He sells items like soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken, fish and dairy products. He has tremendous experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He enjoys a good reputation and his food market is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $1200 loan in order to paint his market’s walls and to add more food to his inventory.  With this loan, he is hoping to gain more profits, that will offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to paint his food market and buy additional inventory.

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 44 years old, married and has three children.

Safaa is a copier and typist.  In 2008, he opened his own shop.  He has a sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and his services are well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $1800 in order to repair and fix his shop’s walls and floors and to add more shelves.  He is hoping to gain more profits which will offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: In order to repair and fix his shop.

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en:
Mostafa is a 43-year-old married man. He lives with his wife and four children.  He’s considered to be the main source of income in the family and is working really hard to provide a better future for his children. 

He started his own metal work nine years ago and is looking forward to growing his business. He works independently, on a free-lance basis.  Today, he has the intention of borrowing a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added metal supplies. He notes that this Kiva loan will increase his profits by 20%. In the future, he plans to expand his business and open his own metal shop.

loans.use: to purchase added metal supplies

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 34-year-old Lebanese married man, living with his wife. He’s the main source of income for his family and is looking to have children. 

Mahmoud has owned a truck for the past ten years. His job consists of transporting products from town to town upon customers’ requests.  Today, he’s asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform the needed maintenance on his truck in addition to painting it. This will definitely facilitate his transportation and allow him to collect higher income. In the future, he plans to buy another truck and hire someone to work with him.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his truck in addition to painting it.

loans.name: Mwanaidi

texts.en: Mwanaidi is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 50,000 to boost her clothes-selling business. With the Kshs 50,000 she wants to purchase a bale of clothes for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing a boutique business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase a bale of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr: Madame Mariama  est âgée  de 35ans et évolue dans le secteur  du commerce. Elle exerce l’achat et la vente de légumes et céréales. Elle a choisi son  activité par nécessité dans le but de se procurer des revenus. Elle est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-MCEC et a déjà remboursé 2 crédits  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un prêt  de 100 000 frs prévu pour  l’aménagement de l’endroit ou elle exerce son activité d’une part et d’autre part  pour l’achat de céréales et légumes destinés a la vente. ce financement lui permettra de mieux développer son activité de commerce, d’accroitre ses bénéfices et de mieux soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge en charge des dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Mariama is 35 years old and works in commerce. She buys and sells vegetables and cereals. She chose her line of work out of necessity, with the aim of earning an income.

Mariama is a member of a UIMCEC branch and has already repaid 2 previous loans. She is requesting a 100 000 franc loan, to be used in part to fit out her place of business, and in part to buy cereals and vegetables destined for resale. This loan will enable her to better develop her sales business, increase her profits and better support her husband with the management of the family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to repair her place of business, and buy cereals and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
El Sr. Enrique es casado, es de la ciudad de Encarnación, tiene 2 hijos. El se dedica  a la fábrica de cerámica-olería en su propia casa, vende  a clientes ocasionales y por pedido.
El es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, comenta que todo el trabajo que hace es por darle lo mejor a sus hijos y que se conviertan en grandes profesional. Su meta es trabajar y de esa forma seguir creciendo y ayudando a su familia.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales y herramientas para usar en su olería, ya que este es su medio de trabajo y de subsistencia, de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Enrique is from the city of Encarnación.  He is married and has two children.  He makes ceramic bricks at his house.  He sells to occasional customers and by order.  He is a very hard-working and enterprising person.  

He says that all of the work he does is to give his children the best and so that they can become great professionals.  His goal is to work, to continue growing, and to continue helping his family.

He is requesting the loan to buy materials and tools to use with his brick oven.  This is his means of work and subsistence for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools to use with his brick oven.

loans.name: Junalyn

texts.en:
Junalyn is a 27-year-old married woman with 2 children. Her oldest child is 3 years old. Junalyn's husband works as a sales clerk.

Junalyn has been in the business of raising hogs for 2 years. She earns about 6000 php per month. Junalyn works hard to take care of her children and manage her business. She is asking for a loan to purchase piglets, feeds and vitamins.  Junalyn hopes this loan will help improve her business. She is planning to save for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feeds and vitamins

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit was born in 1959. She lives in Ijevan with her husband and a daughter, who is a student of Yerevan State University Ijevan branch. Anahit’s husband works as an engineer. Anahit worked as an operator for many years, but in 1997 she decided to run her own business.

Anahit rents a stall in the market, where she sells women's and children's clothes and also children’s shoes. Once a week she and her colleagues from the market, rent a car and go to Yerevan, where they buy merchandise for their business. Thanks to her business income, Anahit is able to provide for her family’s needs and to pay for her daughter’s education at the University. Also, Ahanit was able to repair her apartment and to buy necessary furniture for it. This is Anahit’s fourth loan from Nor Horizon and she has never delayed repayment on her loans. Now, she is requesting a 700.000 AMD loan to buy an assortment of Spring woman’s and children’s clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy Spring clothing for resale.

loans.name: Antoine

texts.en:
Antoine is a 53-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children, one of whom is working and the other is still attending school. Like every couple, Antoine and his wife wish to offer a respectable life to their children.  For this reason, they combine forces to be able to cover the heavy life expenses. 

Antoine opened his own butchery in 1980. He’s a reputable person and always searches to deliver good and fresh products. Today, he’s wishing to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy the needed quantity of meat for his butchery. In that way, he will be capable of developing his business and augmenting his sales. In the future, he plans to raise cattle and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy the needed quantity of meat for his butchery.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en: Constance is taking another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to boost her clothes selling business. With the loan, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She dreams of expanding her business to meet her customers' demands. The loans have improved her family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is a 35-year-old Lebanese woman who lives with her husband and two school-aged children. Her husband has been working as a fireman for the past 22 years in order to enhance their way of living. 

As for Heba, she has had her own home business as a private teacher since 2003. At the same time, she has been working as a teacher in a local school. 

Today, Heba’s looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to change her teaching room’s decoration in addition to painting. She notes that this will improve her way of teaching and allow her to attract additional students. In the future, she plans to open her own learning center.

loans.use: to change her teaching room’s decoration in addition to painting.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 33-year-old Lebanese man who lives with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He’s the one taking care of his family and supporting them.  

Ahmad has owned a bakery in his town since 2008. At the same time, he has been working on his taxi business in his free time. 

Today, he needs to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase raw materials for his bakery. He notes that this will speed up his productivity and therefore increase his profits. 

In the future, Ahmad plans to take more Kiva loans and renovate his bakery.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for his bakery.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La Sra. Francisca  es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está casada tiene 4 hijos. Es por ellos que ella se sacrifica, para darles lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Ella se dedica a la confección de ropa en su ropa, trabaja por pedido y cliente ocasionales de la ciudad y de su barrio. Tiene muy buenos trabajos y es por ello que ya tiene una clientela bien formada, por lo que tiene buenos ingresos. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, botones y demás insumos necesarios para poder seguir trabajando en su taller. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Francisca is from the city of Encarnación.  She is married and has four children.  It is for the children that she makes sacrifices.  She does this in order to give them what they need for a decent life without deprivations.

She devotes herself to making clothes.  She works by order and occasional customers in the city and in her neighborhood.  She does very good work, and that is why she already has a well-formed clientele.  Therefore, she has good income.

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and the other supplies she needs to be able to continue working in her shop.  She is grateful to the Fundación and to Kiva for the opportunity she is getting.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
Khady est une dame de 50 ans qui est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont l’ainé a 22 ans et le cadet, 16. C’est aussi une ancienne cliente du guichet et elle a eu à bénéficier de 3 crédits au sein de cette même institution. Elle est marchande, et a acquis une expérience de  près de 15 ans dans ce domaine qui consiste à aller acheter des marchandises (tissus, sacs à main, chaussures...). Pour cela, elle s’approvisionne en dehors du pays dans un pays limitrophe du Sénégal : la Gambie. 
Khady n’a pas de charge mais travaille à diversifier ses produits et services et à améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Khady is a 50-year old married lady who has four children - the eldest of whom is 22 and the youngest is 16. She is a former customer of the branch and has benefited from 3 loans from this institution. She is a trader and has gained almost 15 years experience in this field that consists of going to buy goods (textiles, handbags, shoes ...). To do this, she sources her goods from a country neighbouring Senegal: The Gambia.
Khady does not have anyone to support but works to diversify her products and services and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy various goods in the Gambia (textiles, handbags, shoes) for resale in Senegal

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Luis tiene 55 años, vive en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus hermosas playas, su clima cálido, así como también es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano y sobre todo por la generosidad de sus pobladores y su buena sazón para la preparación de platillos, es por ello que en especial uno de los platos favoritos de Luis es la riquísima “Carapulcra”; uno de sus pasatiempos favoritos es jugar futbol en especial cuando se siente desanimado o tiene alguna preocupación.

Luis trabaja como albañil,  le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias, es un trabajo muy duro pero él lo realiza con muchas ganas por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio ya que sus clientes se sientes satisfechos con su labor y lo recomiendan.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá darle mantenimiento a vehículo en el cual transporta los materiales que utiliza así como también para comprar herramientas y materiales para la realización de su trabajo, lo que le permitirá tener un vehículo en buen estado para transportar sus herramientas y ya no tener que alquilar movilidad ni tampoco herramientas, así seguirá luchando cada día para poder cumplir su más grande sueño.” Tener una empresa de construcción”.
texts.en:
Luis, age 55, is from the city of Chincha.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches and its warm climate.  It is also known for being the birthplace of great Peruvian sports heroes.  Above all, it is known for the generosity of its people and for the great seasoning used in food preparation.  One of Luis’s favorite dishes is the delicious “Carapulcra” (a spicy Peruvian stew).  One of his favorite pastimes is playing soccer, especially when he is downhearted or worried.

Luis works as a bricklayer, and he works around ten hours a day.  It is very hard work, but he does it with great devotion.  Therefore, he believes that his business is going well for him.  His customers are happy with his work, and they recommend him.

Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their support he will be able to perform maintenance on the vehicle he uses to transport the materials he uses.  He will also buy tools and materials to do his work.  This will allow him to have a vehicle that is in good shape for transporting his tools.  He will no longer have to rent a vehicle or tools.

This way he will continue struggling each day in order to be able to fulfill his big dream of,  “Having a construction company”.

loans.use: to buy tools and perform vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Thierno

texts.fr: Monsieur Thierno est âgé de 29 ans, il est mariée mais n’a pas encore d’enfant. Il est commerçant et gérant d’une boutique depuis 2006. Dans laquelle il vend des denrées alimentaires telles que des pates, du lait, du beurre, du chocolat, du vinaigre et divers autres  marchandises qui entrent dans le panier de la ménagère. Le crédit va lui permettre de  renouveler son stock pour  pouvoir satisfaire la demande qui augmente. Thierno va acheter  une tonne de riz et  un fut d’huile. Avec son bénéfice il gère sa petite famille et arrive à mettre un peu d’argent de coté ; de ce fait il pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de son foyer.
texts.en: Monsieur Thierno is 29 years old. He is married but does not have any children yet. He is a trader and has been managing a shop since 2006. His shop sells foodstuffs such as pasta, milk, butter, chocolate, vinegar and other types of goods that make their way into the baskets of housekeepers. The loan will enable him to replenish his stock in order to meet increasing demand. Thierno will buy a ton of rice and a vat of oil. He will use his earnings to support his family and to put some money aside; this will help him improve the living conditions of his home.

loans.use: To buy rice and oil to sell in his shop

loans.name: Libasse

texts.fr: Monsieur Libasse est âgé de 34 ans. Il vit au Sénégal et est plombier de profession. Il  a choisi son métier dans le souci de se procurer  des revenus afin  de subvenir a ses besoins personnels et familiaux. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Il sollicite un crédit de 75 000 frs prévu pour le préfinancement d’un marché qu’il a gagné. Les financements qui lui sont octroyés par l’institution lui permettent de bien gérer les marchés qu’il engage, d’accroitre ses revenus réguliers, d’améliorer son niveau de vie et de mieux prendre en charge sa famille.
texts.en: Monsieur Libasse is 34 years old. He lives in Senegal and is a plumber by trade. He chose this job as he needed to raise revenues in order to meet his personal needs and the needs of his family. He is a member of one of the branches of U-IMCEC and has already repaid a previous loan. He is requesting a loan of 75,000 frs so that he can pre-finance a contract that he has won. The loans that have been granted to him by the institution enable him to better manage his contracts, increase his regular income, improve his living standards and take better care of his family.

loans.use: to pre-finance a contract

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a 25-year-old lady who is married to Mikson, a 30-year-old man. They are blessed with a son namely, Grevando, 1 year old. 

Maria owns an internet cafe business; she has been running the business for three years. The business is operated from 8 am to 11 pm. Maria employs two assistants to monitor the business alternately. Maria’s business is running well so the profit generated was enough to support her to start up a kiosk business at her residence a month ago. 

Maria desires to complete the stock at her kiosk. She would like to buy coffee, sugar, milk, bath soap, cigarettes, snacks and soft drinks but she does not have enough money to do so. Therefore she is requesting a loan of IDR 3,000,000 from TLM. Maria is hoping that TLM will assist her in improving her business through the loan assistance.

loans.use: to purchase more stock such coffee, sugar, milk, bath soap, cigarettes, snacks and soft drinks

loans.name: Ayub

texts.en:
